GV06avpari_u:1.1.2a: kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśira ārdrā punarvasū puṣyāśleṣā
GV06avpari_u:1.1.2c_0: maghā(ḥ) phālgunī phalgunyau hasta(ś) citrā svāti(r) viśākhe anurādhā jyeṣṭhā mūla(m) pūrvāṣāḍhā uttarāṣāḍābhijic chravaṇaḥ
GV06avpari_u:1.1.2c_1: śraviṣṭhā śatabhiṣaḥ pūrvaproṣṭhapadottaraproṣṭhapadau revaty aśvayujau bharaṇyaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.2.1a_0: ṣaṭ kṛttikā ekā rohiṇī tisro mṛgaśira ekārdrā dve punarvasū ekaḥ puṣyaḥ ṣaḍ āśleṣāḥ ṣaṇ maghāḥ catasraḥ phalgunyaḥ pañca

GV06avpari_u:1.2.1c: mūlam aṣṭāv aṣāḍhā eko 'bhijit tisraḥ śravaṇaḥ pañca śraviṣṭhā ekā śatabhiṣā catasraḥ proṣṭhapadau ekā revatī dve aśvayujau tisro bharaṇyaḥ
GV06avpari_u:1.3.1_0: āgniveśyaḥ kṛttikā rohiṇy ānurohiṇī śvetāyinaṃ mṛgaśira ārdrā bārhadgavī vātsyāyanau punarvasū bhāradvājaḥ puṣyo jātūkarṇyo

GV06avpari_u:1.3.1_3: ātreyaḥ śravaṇo gārgyaḥ śraviṣṭhā dākṣāyaṇī śatabhiṣag vātsyāyanyau pūrve proṣṭhapade āgastyāv uttare śāṅkhāyanī revatī kātyāyan(y)āv
GV06avpari_u:1.3.1_4: aśvayujau mātṛbhyo bharaṇyaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapa ādityaś candramā brahmāṇo nakṣatreṣu ||

GV06avpari_u:1.4.3c: haste ca savitā daivaṃ citrā tu tvaṣṭṛdaivatā ||

GV06avpari_u:1.4.5a: ahir budhnyaś ca mūlasya nirṛtiś cātra daivatam |
GV06avpari_u:1.4.5c: āpaḥ pūrvāsv aṣāḍhāsu viśve devās tathottare ||
GV06avpari_u:1.4.7a: aja ekapād diśaś ca ādityaś ca tathottare |

GV06avpari_u:1.5.2a: ārdrāṃ śatabhiṣajaṃ svātim āśleṣā bharaṇīr api |
GV06avpari_u:1.5.3a: punarvasū viśākhe ca uttarāṇi ca dvandvinām |

GV06avpari_u:1.5.4c: śravaṇaś ca śraviṣṭhāś ca revaty aśvayujau nava ||
GV06avpari_u:1.5.6c: ubhayatobhāgāni vartamāne[[na]] naktaṃbhāgāni samaṃ candreṇa vā ||
GV06avpari_u:1.6.1a: bahūni jātāni graho hinasti kṛttikāsu tiṣṭhann uta dīrgham āyuḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1.6.1c: ajāvayo mūṣikāś ca vyathante viśo brahmaṇaḥ saha mlecchavāṃś ca ||
GV06avpari_u:1.6.2a: kaliṅgānāṃ vyathate nanu rājā hiraṇyakārāṃś ca nihanti kṛtsnam |
GV06avpari_u:1.6.2c: ayaskārā lohakārā āhitāgniś ca kṛtsnaṃ niyanti sahāgnitaptaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.6.3a: ayo lohaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ hiraṇyamiśraṃ [yac] ca patanti sāram |
GV06avpari_u:1.6.3c: kāśāḥ kuśā yac ca suvarṇavarṇaṃ yac cāgnivarṇaṃ phalamūlapuṣpam ||
GV06avpari_u:1.6.4: [ye tatra jātāḥ] sarāṃsi śuṣyanty apayanti nadyaḥ prajā vyathante paśavo mṛgāś ca || prajāpater hṛdaye pīḍyamāne sarvaṃ jagad vyathate sapradeśam ||
GV06avpari_u:1.6.5a: mahābhaumo rājā mariṣyatīti vidyād ekāriṇāṃ chavakām invakāsu |
GV06avpari_u:1.6.5c: nakṣatrabhāge niyanti yojadhānāḥ tathā hi nūnaṃ triṇavena sṛṣṭam ||
GV06avpari_u:1.6.6a: tathā sa ninye nidhānadarśanāya tatra teṣāṃ sahākṣemaṃ tasya vidyāt |
GV06avpari_u:1.6.6c: paritya ye pūrvapadān balena uttiṣṭhanti vīryavanto mṛgānām
GV06avpari_u:1.6.7a: bhagena devy upayanti divyam ārdrābhāge sahino bhavanti |
GV06avpari_u:1.6.7c: tatra daivān mānuṣyāṃś ca punarvasvor nakṣatra bhāge niniyoja dhānāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.6.8a: tathā hi nūnaṃ puṣyo bhāga ekadhā brāhmaṇānāṃ tathā vidur
GV06avpari_u:1.6.9a: śatadrayaḥ kaiśikā dakṣiṇārdhā āndhrāś ca yogahāsayā
GV06avpari_u:1.6.10c: maghābhāge aṣṭame devasṛṣṭam | saṃyujyante devaprasādanena tatra ||
GV06avpari_u:1.7.1c: tunyam atha saptamātraṃ pūrvabhāge navake phalgunīṣu ||
GV06avpari_u:1.7.2a: matsyā māgadhāś cedayaś ca śālvā matsyā ubhe phalgunīṣu |
GV06avpari_u:1.7.3a: pūrvācāryā icchamānāś ca sarve yakṛt kloma saha bhāgena haste |
GV06avpari_u:1.7.4a: ye pūrvārdhe nijīhate carantaḥ śāntā mṛgā [jantu]paśavo apagāminas te |
GV06avpari_u:1.7.4c: paśavo bhavatāś ca sarve citrāyā bhāge sahino bhavanti ||
GV06avpari_u:1.7.5a: tatrā--cyutakeśaṃ vāhanaṃ jayārthaṃ kumāryo anaḍvān sahate atra ye |
GV06avpari_u:1.7.5c: vijñāyate devasṛṣṭaṃ purāṇaṃ svātiṃ bhajante tṛṇavaś ca sarve ||

GV06avpari_u:1.7.6c: tasmin gṛhīte bhayam eva teṣāṃ daivopasṛṣṭe tu balena kāryam || ye tatra jātāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.7.7a: ye paścārdhe nijīhate caranta āsavo mṛgā uttarārdhāś cāndhrāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1.7.7c: anūrādhāsu magadhavaṅgamatsyāḥ sarve samagrāḥ sahino bhavanti tatra ||
GV06avpari_u:1.7.8: pañcaikadhā janapadā bhavanti sayujaḥkāsaubaladādauṣyadhāḥ | bāhlīkā jyeṣṭhā upayanti bhaktyā tatra ||
GV06avpari_u:1.7.9c: tathā vidur nakṣatraveditāras tathā hi nūnam
GV06avpari_u:1.7.10a: kāmbojāḥ kālamṛṣāś ca krandā ucchuṣmāṇaḥ śvānaś
GV06avpari_u:1.7.10c: cāvadhūmamarkaṭāś ca pūrvāṣāḍhā upayanti bhaktyā tatra ||
GV06avpari_u:1.8.1a: viśve devāḥ saha pañcālajyeṣṭhā āpaś ca yāḥ pāntu bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyat |

GV06avpari_u:1.8.9: acyutakeśaṃ vāhanaṃ ca padārtham ucāvacajanapadā mahāntaḥ | aśvayujau hārthavijñāya bhejire tatra ||
GV06avpari_u:1.8.10a: ubhaye kīkaṭāḥ kauśalāś ca rahaś ca[vo] ye ca prasuptāś
GV06avpari_u:1.8.10c: caranti bharaṇīḥ sahārthavijñāya bhejire tatra teṣāṃ sahākṣayam asya vidyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:1.9.2a: utpātān yas tu yān vidyād divyāntarikṣapārthivān |

GV06avpari_u:1.41.3c: tava vrājaṃ staumasi devabhojanau pratyagbhiṣak śatabhiṣak śivau naḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.41.4a: śunāsīrau naḥ pramumūtu jihmasau tautau pitṛbhyo dadatu[[ḥ]] stanau śubhau |
GV06avpari_u:1.41.4c: tau pūrvajau kṛṇutām ekapād ajaḥ pratiṣṭhānau sarvakāmābhayāya ca ||
GV06avpari_u:1.41.5c: so 'hir budhnyaḥ kṛṇutām uttarau śivau pratiṣṭhānau sarvakāmābhayāya ca ||
GV06avpari_u:1.41.6a: yaṃ mahāhemam ṛṣitaḥ prasāmavid bharadvājaś candramasau divākaram |
GV06avpari_u:1.41.6c: sajuṣṭānām aśvayujau bhayāya ca sa naḥ pūṣā kṛṇutāṃ revatīṃ śivām ||
GV06avpari_u:1.41.7a: jīrṇaṃ santaṃ yau yuvānaṃ hi cakratur ṛṣiṃ dhiyā cyavanaṃ somapau kṛtau |
GV06avpari_u:1.41.7c: tau naś cittibhir bhiṣajām asya satkarau .... prajām aśvinyām aśvinau śivau ||
GV06avpari_u:1.41.8a: yasya śyāmaśabalau rakṣataḥ svadhā duṣkṛt sukṛd vividhā carṣaṇīdhṛtau |
GV06avpari_u:1.41.8c: tau savitryā ca savitur dharmacāribhir yamo rājā bharaṇībhir no 'bhirakṣatu ||
GV06avpari_u:1.42.2c: yajed grahān haviṣyeṇa yathoktena ca devatāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.42.4c: apāṃ stotraiḥ pavitraiś ca nakṣatrastutibhis tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:1.42.7a: eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭaḥ sadasyebhyaś ca dakṣiṇā |
GV06avpari_u:1.42.7c: pūrvam āpyāyayed dehaṃ paścād dadyāt tu dakṣiṇām ||
GV06avpari_u:1.42.8a: anena vidhinā snātvā dadyāc caivātra dakṣiṇām |
GV06avpari_u:1.42.8c: prāpnoty anunayaṃ puṃsaḥ sa vedaphalam aśnute || [prāpnoty: prāpṇoty ed. (misprint)]
GV06avpari_u:1.42.9a: ātmānaṃ nirmalīkṛtya devān iṣṭvā grahāṃs tathā |
GV06avpari_u:1.42.9c: vidvadbhyo dakṣiṇā deyā dvijān annena tarpayet ||
GV06avpari_u:1.43.2c: akṣatān antaraṃ kṛtvā tathā saubhāgyam arhati ||
GV06avpari_u:1.43.3a: yadā mṛgaśiro yujyet tadā snānaṃ vidhīyate |
GV06avpari_u:1.43.4c: ārdrāyāṃ vaṇijaḥ snātāḥ sulābhāṃs tu labhanti te ||
GV06avpari_u:1.43.5c: gopīṭhe snāpayed go 'rthī kṣipraṃ gomān bhaviṣyati ||
GV06avpari_u:1.43.6c: sahasravīryānantyā ca madayantīpriyaṅgubhiḥ | trīn puṣyān brāhmaṇaḥ snātaḥ pārthivaṃ labhate yaśaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.43.8a: maghābhis tu tilaiḥ snāyād utpalaiḥ kamalais tathā |
GV06avpari_u:1.43.8c: tasmiṃs tu māse sā kanyā kṣipraṃ ca labhate patim ||
GV06avpari_u:1.43.9c: madhv eva ca tṛtīyaṃ syāt saubhāgyaṃ bhogavardhanam ||
GV06avpari_u:1.44.2c: yoṣārthī snāpayet tena kṣipraṃ sa labhate priyām ||
GV06avpari_u:1.44.3a: svātinā tu gandhaiḥ snāyād utpalaiḥ kumudais tathā |
GV06avpari_u:1.44.3c: tasmiṃs tu māse sā kanyā kṣipraṃ nirvyūhyate tataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.44.4a: khaḍgasya ca viṣāṇena gajasya ṛṣabhasya vā |
GV06avpari_u:1.44.6c: rasaiś ca miśradhānyaiś cābhiṣiktaḥ prāśayed rasān ||
GV06avpari_u:1.44.8a: atha pūrvāsv aṣāḍhāsu yā snāyād ahate paṭe |
GV06avpari_u:1.44.9a: athottarāsv aṣāḍhāsu yaḥ snāyāc ced upoṣitaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1.44.10c: abhijid brāhmaṇaḥ snātaḥ pārthivaṃ labhate yaśaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.45.1a: śravaṇena sravantīnāṃ yaḥ snāyāt saṃgameṣu ca |
GV06avpari_u:1.45.1c: sa saṃgacchati svarṇena hiraṇyena dhanena vā ||
GV06avpari_u:1.46.1a: sarvajñaḥ sarvaga śaṃsa nārada prajñānam anyasmād
GV06avpari_u:1.46.1c: anūnaprajñāt svargasya lokasya dehādyairyāt pathibhir upapanno manuṣyaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.46.2c: prāg astaṃgamanabhojanād yad enaṃ nityam atandritaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.48.2c: sāsmai sarvān kāmān dugdh[v]ā eti pūrvā payasvinī ||
GV06avpari_u:1.48.5a: sarpān nirhanti pretasya paripanthi sukhād bhayāt |
GV06avpari_u:1.48.5c: maghābhis tu tilān dadyān madhumiśrān smaran pitṝn ||
GV06avpari_u:1.49.1a: bṛhaddhastirathaṃ yuktaṃ hastena tu dadan naraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1.49.1c: savituḥ sthānam āpnoti divyāṃ kāmajavāṃ sabhām ||
GV06avpari_u:1.49.2c: gandhaiḥ śuśrūṣamāṇas tu dhruve sthāne [sugandhiḥ] prapadyate ||
GV06avpari_u:1.49.3a: svātāv ekadhanaṃ dadyād yadyad asya priyaṃ gṛhe |
GV06avpari_u:1.49.4a: dhenuṃ tu rūpasaṃpannām anaḍvāhau tu vā vahau |
GV06avpari_u:1.49.5a: anūrādhāsu prāvaraṇam annaṃ tu śuci jyeṣṭhāyāṃ ca |
GV06avpari_u:1.49.5c: dadyāc cānnaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo bhakṣair uccāvacaiḥ saha ||
GV06avpari_u:1.49.6c: mātus tenānṛṇo bhavati saṃkarāc ca vimucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:1.50.2: ajaṃ saṃpacyodanaṃ dadyāt pūrvayoḥ proṣṭhapadayor aurabhreṇa sahottarayoḥ
GV06avpari_u:1.50.3a: dhenuṃ ca rūpasaṃpannāṃ gaur gṛṣṭiḥ pūrṇadohanīm |
GV06avpari_u:1.50.6a: anaḍvāhaṃ tu yo dadyāt suhṛdaṃ sādhuvāhinam |
GV06avpari_u:1.50.7a: [yadā vatsasya pādau dvau śiras cāpi pradṛśyate |
GV06avpari_u:1.50.7c: tadā gauḥ pṛthivī jñeyā yāvad garbhaṃ na muñcati ||]
GV06avpari_u:1.50.8c: tayā durgāṇi tarati kṣuradhārāṃś ca parvatān ||
GV06avpari_u:1.50.9a: nakṣatrāṇāṃ yathā somo jyotiṣām iva bhāskaraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1.50.9c: bhāti divyaṃ divaṃ jyotiḥ pāvakaḥ śucir uttamaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1.50.10a: evam uktāṃ nakṣatradakṣiṇāṃ yo dadātīha jīvaloke |
GV06avpari_u:1.50.10c: [[a]]pahatya tamaḥ sarvaṃ brahmaloke mahīyate | yathā yaṣṭus tathādhyetur eṣā brāhmī pratiśrutir eṣā brāhmī pratiśrutir iti ||
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.1a: oṃ yad rājānaṃ śakadhūmaṃ nakṣatrāṇy akṛṇvata |
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.1c: bhadrāham asmai prāyacchan tato rāṣṭram ajāyata ||
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.2a: bhadrāham astu naḥ sāyaṃ bhadrāhaṃ prātar astu naḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.2c: bhadrāham asmabhyaṃ tvaṃ śakadhūma sadā kṛṇu ||
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.3a: yo no bhadrāham akaraḥ sāyaṃ prātar atho divā |
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.3c: tasmai te nakṣatrarāja śakadhūma sadā namaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.4a: yad āhuḥ śakadhūma[[ṃ]] mahānakṣatrāṇāṃ prathamajaṃ jyotir agre |
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.4c: tan naḥ śatīm abhikṛṇotu rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ niyacchāt
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.5a: yo 'smin yakṣma[[ḥ]] puruṣe praviṣṭa iṣitaṃ daivyaṃ sahaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.5ca: agniṣ ṭaṃ ghṛtabodhano 'paskanda no vidūram asmat so 'nyena samṛcchāt ||
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.6a: yas tvā mātur uta vā pituḥ parijāyamānam abhisaṃbabhūva |
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.6c: na tvad yam adhināsayāma so 'nyasmai sayātaiḥ praviṣṭaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1b.1.7a: aliklavā gṛdhrāḥ kaṅkāḥ suparṇāḥ śvāpadāḥ patatriṇo
GV06avpari_u:2.1.2a: daivaṃ prabhavate śreṣṭhaṃ hetumātraṃ tu pauruṣam |
GV06avpari_u:2.1.2c: daivena tu suguptena śakto jetuṃ vasuṃdharām ||
GV06avpari_u:2.1.3a: daivāt puruṣakārāc ca daivam eva viśiṣyate |
GV06avpari_u:2.1.3c: tasmād daivaṃ viśeṣeṇa pūjayet tu mahīpatiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2.1.5a: apitā tu yathā bālas tathāsāṃvatsaro nṛpaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2.1.5c: amātṛko yathā bālas tathātharvavivarjitaḥ || arimadhye yathaikākī tathā vaidyavivarjitaḥ
GV06avpari_u:2.1.7c: prajāpatir athaiko hi na vedatrayam īkṣate ||
GV06avpari_u:2.2.1a: atharvabhinnaṃ yac chāntaṃ tac chāntaṃ netarais tribhiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2.2.2a: atharvā sṛjate ghoram adbhutaṃ śamayet tathā |
GV06avpari_u:2.2.2c: atharvā rakṣate yajñaṃ yajñasya patir aṅgirāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2.2.4a: brahmā śamayen nādhvaryur na chandogo na bahvṛcaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2.2.4c: rakṣāṃsi rakṣati brahmā brahmā tasmād atharvavit ||
GV06avpari_u:2.2.5c: śāntyarthaṃ ca mahīpālo vṛṇuyād bhārgavaṃ gurum ||
GV06avpari_u:2.3.2c: yena vā parituṣyeta gurus tat pārthivaś caret ||
GV06avpari_u:2.3.3a: ghnanti daivopasargāś ca na ca devo 'bhivarṣati |
GV06avpari_u:2.3.3c: vīrās tatra na sūyante yad rāṣṭram apurohitam ||
GV06avpari_u:2.3.4a: na haviḥ pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ pitaro dvijāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2.3.4c: tasya bhūmipater yasya gṛhe nātharvavid guruḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2.4.3a: bahvṛco hanti vai rāṣṭram adhvaryur nāśayet sutān |
GV06avpari_u:2.4.4a: ajñānād vā pramādād vā yasya syād bahvṛco guruḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2.5.1a: yathaiva paṅgur adhvānam apakṣī cāṇḍajo nabhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2.5.1c: evaṃ chandogaguruṇā rājā vṛddhiṃ na gacchati ||
GV06avpari_u:2.5.2a: purodhā jalado yasya maudo vā syāt kadā cana |
GV06avpari_u:2.5.2c: abdād daśabhyo māsebhyo rāṣṭrabhraṃśaṃ sa gacchati ||
GV06avpari_u:2.5.4a: trayo lokās trayo devās trayo vedās trayo 'gnayaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2.5.4c: ardhamātre layaṃ yānti vedaś cātharvaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2.5.5a: na tithir na ca nakṣatraṃ na graho na ca candramāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2.6.1c: vardhate dhanadhānyena rāṣṭram evaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2.6.2c: bhūmikāmo na yāceta dātāram api pārthivam ||
GV06avpari_u:2.6.3c: pūyate bhrūṇahāpy evaṃ cāṇḍālānnāda eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:2.6.5a: yajanād abhicārād vā kva cid vā mantrakarmaṇi |
GV06avpari_u:2.6.5c: pūtān eva dvijān prāhur agnikāñcanavarcasa iti ||
GV06avpari_u:3.1.6: ācāryapurohitavajramukhata ity āha durmatiḥ sa bhāradvājo
GV06avpari_u:3.1.7: na hy agner ivopayuktasyopayogo vidyata iti parāśaro
GV06avpari_u:3.1.10a_1: sa tasya pratyaṅgiro bhūtvā hastyaśvarathapadātikaṃ prakṛtimukhebhyo (AVParis_3,1.11) variṣyan na punaḥ kuryād anyaṃ rājā
GV06avpari_u:3.1.10c: nirmālyam iva taṃ rājā nānyo bhūyaḥ samācaret ||
GV06avpari_u:3.1.12: svajasraṃ hy agnau hetur bhagavato vyādhitapatitonmattābhiśastaprahīṇapradhvastasaṃprasāraṇam ṛtvik ||
GV06avpari_u:3.1.13a: tasmāt kulīnaṃ śrotriyaṃ bhṛgvaṅgirovidaṃ vinayākṛtiśaucācārayuktam alolupaṃ
GV06avpari_u:3.1.13c_1: himātapavarṣasahaṃ hrīdhṛtikam ārjavaṃ śamadamadayādānaśaktisaṃpannaṃ bṛhaspatyuśanasoḥ sthānākṛtipramāṇaṃ varṇāśrutavapuṣā
GV06avpari_u:3.1.13c_2: cānumeyaṃ tejasvinaṃ gambhīraṃ sattvayuktaṃ guruṃ vṛṇīyād bhūpatir iti ||
GV06avpari_u:3.1.14: madhuparkādyena vidhinā yathārthaṃ saṃpādya dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt
GV06avpari_u:3.1.16a: yathābhūmipramāṇena vā (AVParis_3,1.17) hastyaśvaṃ narayānaṃ divyam ābharaṇam ātapatraṃ hiraṇyaṃ
GV06avpari_u:3.2.1a: hastyaśvaṃ gurave dadyān narayānaṃ tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:3.2.1c: divyam ābharaṇaṃ caiva ātapatrādim eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:3.2.2c: mantrauṣadhyo na sidhyanti rājā tatra vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:3.2.3c: na ca hīnātiriktāṅgaṃ kva cit kuryāt purohitam ||
GV06avpari_u:3.2.4a: hīnādhikāṅgaṃ patitaṃ vivarṇaṃ stenaṃ jaḍaṃ klībam aśaktiyuktam |
GV06avpari_u:3.2.4c: bhinnasvaraṃ kāṇaṃ virūpanetraṃ dveṣyaṃ ca rājā guruṃ naiva kuryāt ||
GV06avpari_u:3.2.5c: stene tv aśakte ca samastadoṣāḥ klībe vivarṇe nṛpatir vinaśyet ||
GV06avpari_u:3.3.1a: bhinnasvare jāyate gātrabhedo dveṣye gurau vipratipattim āhuḥ |
GV06avpari_u:3.3.1c: vivarṇanetre patite tu putrān adhvaryuṇā ca nihanti pautrān ||
GV06avpari_u:3.3.2c: piṅgalaḥ pārthivaṃ hanyād rāṣṭraṃ hanyāt tu kekaraḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:3.3.3a: bahvṛcaṃ hi niyuñjyād yaḥ paurohitye tu pārthivaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:3.3.3c: sa tārapaṅke hastīva saha tenaiva majjati ||
GV06avpari_u:3.3.4a: adhvaryuṃ hi niyuñjyād yaḥ paurohitye tu pārthivaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:3.3.7: makheṣu rāṣṭreṣu pureṣu caiva senāsu rājñāṃ svaniveśaneṣu | ya utpātās trividhā ghorarūpās tān sarvān śamayed brahmavedavit ||
GV06avpari_u:3.3.8a: tasmād guruṃ vedarahasyayuktaṃ caturvidhe karmaṇi cāpramattam |
GV06avpari_u:3.3.8c: śāntaṃ ca dāntaṃ ca jitendriyaṃ ca kuryān narendraḥ priyadarśanaṃ ca || priyadarśanaṃ ceti iti rājaprathamābhiṣekaḥ samāptaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:4.1.1a: om atha purohitakarmāṇi || rājñaḥ prātar utthitasya
GV06avpari_u:4.1.2a: atha purohitaḥ snātānuliptaḥ śuciḥ śuklavāsāḥ soṣṇīṣaḥ
GV06avpari_u:4.1.4: pari dhatteti dvābhyāṃ rājño vastram abhimantrya prayacchet ||
GV06avpari_u:4.1.8: ehi jīvaṃ trāyamāṇam ity akṣiṇī aṅkte ||
GV06avpari_u:4.1.11: yat te mātā yat te piteti narayānam ||
GV06avpari_u:4.1.13c: marditāḥ śatravo 'nena vaśam āyāntu te sadeti ||
GV06avpari_u:4.1.14a: paryaṅkam āsanaṃ khaḍgaṃ dhvajaṃ chattraṃ sacāmaram |
GV06avpari_u:4.1.14c: ratham aśvagajaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dhanur varma śareṣudhim ||
GV06avpari_u:4.1.16c: abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivīty abhimantrito brāhmaṇān praṇipatya prāk ||
GV06avpari_u:4.1.21a: asuraiḥ pīḍyamānas tu purā śakro jagatprabhuḥ |
GV06avpari_u:4.1.23a: proktāni maṅgalāny aṣṭau brāhmaṇo gaur hutāśanaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:4.1.23c: bhūmiḥ siddhārthakāḥ sarpiḥ śamī vrīhiyavau tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:4.1.24a: etāni satataṃ puṇyāni saṃpaśyann arcayann api |
GV06avpari_u:4.1.24c: na prāpnoty āpadaṃ rājā śriyaṃ prāpnoty anuttamām ||
GV06avpari_u:4.2.1: atha rājakarmāṇi (AVParis_4,2.2) viśvāvasau muhūrte snāto abhiṣekamantrair abhimantritaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:4.2.6: yad duḥkṛtaṃ yac chabalaṃ sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ dahatv ity (AVParis_4,2.7) anena mantreṇa suvarṇaṃ śarīre nighṛṣya dakṣiṇena hastena viprāya dadyād
GV06avpari_u:4.2.8a: dhenuṃ cārogām (AVParis_4,2.9) aparimitaguṇān tilān sauvarṇamaye tāmramaye vā pātre
GV06avpari_u:4.2.8c: sthāpayitvā yad ajñānād ity abhimantrya viprāya dadyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:4.2.10a: yad ajñānāt tathā jñānād yan mayā śabalaṃ kṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:4.2.10c: tat sarvaṃ tiladānena dahyatām iti hi prabho ||
GV06avpari_u:4.2.13a: annaṃ tu vividhaṃ nityaṃ pradadyāt dvijātaye |
GV06avpari_u:4.2.14a: gṛhadevāṃs tu saṃpūjya kāryaś cāpy utsavo gṛhe |
GV06avpari_u:4.2.14c: chattrādīni ca yānāni pūjayed vidhivat svayam ||
GV06avpari_u:4.2.15a: [puṣpaiś ca vividhaiḥ śubhraiḥ phalaiś cāpy arcayed budhaḥ] tasmāt sarvāṇi satataṃ dānāni tu mahīpatiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:4.2.15c: dattvā śraddhānvito viprair vṛto bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:4.3.1a: atha piṣṭamayīṃ rātriṃ caturbhir dīpakaiḥ saha |

GV06avpari_u:20.7.9: [yāvat] imā āpaḥ pavanena pūtā hiraṇyavarṇā anavadyarūpāḥ | tāvad imaṃ dhūrtaṃ pravāhayāmi pravāhito me dehi varān yathoktān ||
GV06avpari_u:20.7.10a: uditeṣu nakṣatreṣu gṛhān praviṣṭo gṛhiṇīṃ paśyet
GV06avpari_u:20.7.11a: yad bhoktuṃ kāmajātaṃ jagatyāṃ manasā saṃhīhate tattad dvijanmā pinākasenayajamānāt kāmam upabhukto bhuktvāmṛtatvaṃ tadvad evābhyupaiti ||
GV06avpari_u:21.1.1c: yaiḥ karma kriyamāṇaṃ hi phalavat syād dvijanmanām ||
GV06avpari_u:21.1.2c: śuṣkān api śvetavarṇān āhuḥ śāntikarān budhāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.1.3: surabhīṇi ca puṣpāṇi susvādūni phalāni ca manoharāṇi vāsāṃsi saṃbhāreṣūpakalpayet
GV06avpari_u:21.1.4a: surabhīṇy eva bījāni anyavastūni yāni ca |
GV06avpari_u:21.1.7c: gāvaś ca dakṣiṇārthaṃ hi payasvinyaḥ sulakṣaṇāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:21.1.6c: te sadasyā iti proktā vācane yajñakarmaṇi ||
GV06avpari_u:21.1.7a: sarve te 'pi hy atharvāṇa ṛtvijaḥ ṣoḍaśa smṛtāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:21.2.5c: sruvaś ca śāntuke jñeyaḥ srug uktā yajñalakṣaṇā ||
GV06avpari_u:21.3.1a: sauvarṇaḥ śāntike proktaḥ pālaśo vātha khādiraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:21.3.2c: viśeṣeṇa tu vidveṣe sruvo nimbamayaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.3.3a: pauṣṭike rājataṃ vidyāt tāmraṃ ca vijayāvaham |
GV06avpari_u:21.3.3c: amṛtādau tu vijñeyaś cāndanaḥ siddhidaḥ sruvaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.3.4a: sruvāṇāṃ viṣayaṃ jñātvā kīlakānāṃ vidhiṃ tathā |
GV06avpari_u:21.4.4c: prācīṃ saṃśodhya yatnena maṇḍapaṃ tatra kārayet ||
GV06avpari_u:21.4.5a: navakoṣṭhaṃ samaṃ vāpi hastaiḥ ṣoṣaśabhir mitam |
GV06avpari_u:21.5.2a: caturguṇocchrayāś caiva mūlastambhās tu ye tataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:21.5.2c: upastambhās tu ye pārśve tadardhena prakīrtitāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.5.3a: kumbhāḥ stambhais tathā deyāḥ kāmair dvāraṃ diśāṃ smṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:21.5.4c: sarvadikṣu plavaṃ caiva kuṇḍasyordhvaṃ na chādayet ||
GV06avpari_u:21.6.1c: arcitaṃ pūjitaṃ nityaṃ śāntau śāntigṛhaṃ smṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:21.6.2c: raktā pītā ca dhūmrā ca kṛṣṇā nīlātha pāṇḍurā ||
GV06avpari_u:21.6.4: [pītaraktasitāḥ śyāmā patākāḥ ṣoḍaśa smṛtāḥ |] kalaśān ṣoḍaśān tatra upariṣṭān mahādhvajaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.6.5c: maṇimuktāphalaiḥ puṣpair hṛdyaiś ca madhuraiḥ phalaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.6.6a: samantād dikṣu vinyastaiḥ pradīpaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:21.6.6c: dhūpair balyupahāraiś ca jayaghoṣaiś ca bandinām ||
GV06avpari_u:21.6.8c: saṃprokṣya vidhivan mantrair ānayed araṇī tataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.7.1c: homaṃ kṛtvā yathoktaṃ tu nimittāny upalakṣayet ||
GV06avpari_u:21.7.3c: vahniḥ siddhikaro jñeyaḥ saptarātrān na saṃśayaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.7.4c: taṃ vidyāt siddhidaṃ vahniṃ padmavarṇanibhaṃ tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:21.7.5c: yathoktaviparītas tu na vahniḥ syāt prayaṃkaraḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:21.7.6c: tatra nityaṃ mahāsiddhir asamāpte vinirdiśet || asamāpte vinirdiśet || iti saṃbhāralakṣaṇaṃ samāptam ||
GV06avpari_u:22.1.1a: om athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi araṇyoś caiva lakṣaṇam |
GV06avpari_u:22.1.1c: rūpam athā pramāṇaṃ ca guṇadoṣān tathaiva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:22.1.2c: purā kalpe ca yad dṛṣṭam ṛṣibhiś caiva lakṣaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:22.1.4a: tithau śubhāyāṃ nakṣatre diśaṃ gatvā tv aninditām |
GV06avpari_u:22.1.4c: aśvatthāt tu śamīgarbhād uktam āharaṇaṃ śruteḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.1.5c: madhye mūlaṃ na bāhye tu sa garbhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.2.1a: abhāve tu śamīgarbhe aśvatthād eva vāharet |
GV06avpari_u:22.2.3a: ā skandhād uraso vāpi iti staudāyanaiḥ smṛtā |
GV06avpari_u:22.2.4c: jaladāyanair vitastir vā ṣoḍaśeti tu bhārgavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.3.1a: tasyās tu piṇḍaḥ ṣaḍbhāge caturbhāge tu vistare |
GV06avpari_u:22.3.2c: anyaiś ca doṣaiḥ saṃyuktā varjanīyā prayatnataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.3.3c: klinnā vināśayet putrān sphuṭitā śokam āvahet ||
GV06avpari_u:22.3.4a: ūrdhvaśuṣke na kartavyā kṛṣṇe rūkṣe tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:22.3.4c: ubhe apy ekavṛkṣe ca araṇiś cottarāraṇiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.3.5a: tatpramāṇā tadardhā vā bhūyasī vā yathecchayā |
GV06avpari_u:22.3.5c: anenaiva tu manthavyo na kuryād yonisaṃkaram ||
GV06avpari_u:22.4.1c: sa yajñas tāmaso nāma phalaṃ tatra na vidyate ||
GV06avpari_u:22.4.2a: piṇḍe tv ayanaviṣuvau pṛthutve ṛtavaḥ sthitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.4.2c: ardhamāsāś ca dīrghatve kālaś cātra pratiṣṭhitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.4.3c: tatpradhānāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā yajñaś cāpi tathaiva hi ||
GV06avpari_u:22.4.4c: dvitīye jānunī ūrū tṛtīye śroṇir ucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:22.4.5a: caturthe jaṭharaṃ sāṅgaṃ grīvā caiva tu pañcame |
GV06avpari_u:22.4.5c: ṣaṣthe śiraḥ samākhyātam aṅgāny etāni nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:22.5.1c: jānunoś ca tathā corvo rākṣastvaṃ prayāti hi ||
GV06avpari_u:22.5.2a: śroṇyāṃ ca sarvakāmā[ḥ] syur jaṭhare kṣut tathā smṛtā |
GV06avpari_u:22.5.2c: urasy amitrā grīvāyāṃ mṛtyuḥ śirasi vedanā ||
GV06avpari_u:22.5.3a: śroṇyām evāta aicchanti nirdoṣā kīrtitā yataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.5.3c: tathā vittapaśūn putrān svargam āyuḥ priyaṃ sukham ||
GV06avpari_u:22.5.4a: prathamaṃ manthanaṃ śroṇyām ādhāne ca viśeṣataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.5.4c: itarāṇi yatheṣtaṃ hi grīvāṃ sarvatra varjayet ||
GV06avpari_u:22.5.5a: trīṇy aṅgulāni tyaktvādau tathā catvāri cāntataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.5.5c: madhye devāḥ sthitās tasmād vahniṃ tatraiva manthayet ||
GV06avpari_u:22.6.1a: anulomā bhaved yoniḥ pārśvabhedo na vidyate |
GV06avpari_u:22.6.2a: mūlād aṅgulam utsṛjya trīṇitrīṇi ca pārśvayoḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.6.2c: devayonis tu vijñeyā tatra mathyo hutāśanaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.6.3a: [mūlāt tyaktvāṅgulāny aṣṭau agrāt tu dvādaśaiva hi |
GV06avpari_u:22.6.3c: antare devayoniḥ syāt tatra mathyo hutāśanaḥ] ||
GV06avpari_u:22.6.4a: vedā yajñāya saṃbhūtā yajñā agnau pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.6.4c: araṇyor jāyate cāgnis tayos tasmāt pradhānatā ||
GV06avpari_u:22.6.5c: netraṃ tu ṣaḍguṇaṃ cātrād uttaro 'ṣṭāṅgulaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.7.1a: aṣṭāṅgulaḥ pramanthaḥ syāc cātraṃ syād dvādaśāṅgulam |
GV06avpari_u:22.7.2a: vyāmamantraṃ vadanty eke anye hastatrayaṃ viduḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.7.3a: cātre ca bhāskarāḥ proktā uttare vasavas tathā |
GV06avpari_u:22.7.3c: netre devagaṇāḥ sarve viṣṇuś caiva tu pīḍake ||
GV06avpari_u:22.7.4a: araṇir yā dvitīyā tu uttarā sā prakīrtitā |
GV06avpari_u:22.7.4c: tatraikadeśaṃ saṃgṛhya uttaraḥ sa ca kīrtitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.7.5c: pāṇibhyāṃ pīḍanaṃ śubhram uttarāgraṃ pragṛhya tu ||
GV06avpari_u:22.8.1a: mūle mūlaṃ tu saṃyojya cātrasyaivottarasya ca |
GV06avpari_u:22.8.2a: netreṇa bhrāmayec cātraṃ yāvad vahniḥ prajāyate |
GV06avpari_u:22.8.2c: sarvair hi devaiḥ saṃpannas tena sarvasukhaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.8.3a: brahmādyair daivataiś caiva vidvadbhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.8.4c: tanmantrena dvijāgryair vā smṛtam etad dhi manthanam ||
GV06avpari_u:22.9.1a: (AVParis_22.9.1) (atha) yady araṇī jīrṇe syātāṃ jantubhir manthanena vā ||
GV06avpari_u:22.9.1c: samānīte nave araṇī āhṛtya śve bhūte darśenāṣṭvā tasmin pūrve śakalīkṛtya gārhapatye prakṣipyopary agnau dhārayan japati ||
GV06avpari_u:22.9.2a: ud budhyasvāgne pra viśasya yonyāṃ devayajyāyai voḍhave jātavedaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:22.9.2c: araṇyor araṇī saṃ carasva jīrṇāṃ tvacam ajīrṇayā nir ṇudasvety
GV06avpari_u:22.9.4a: mano jyotir juṣatām ājyasya vichinnaṃ yajñaṃ sam imaṃ dadhātu |
GV06avpari_u:22.9.4c: yā iṣṭā uṣaso yā aniṣṭās tāḥ saṃ cinomi haviṣā ghṛtena svāheti agnaye 'gnimate 'ṣṭākapālaṃ puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati || śarāv odanaṃ sadakṣiṇaṃ dadāti || sā prakṛteṣtiḥ saṃgṛhyate ||
GV06avpari_u:22.10.1c: araṇyoś cāṅgasaṃbhūtaṃ netraṃ cātraṃ ca pīḍakaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:22.10.2a: ya idaṃ dhārayiṣyati araṇyor iha lakṣaṇam |
GV06avpari_u:22.10.2c: na tasya durlabhaṃ kiṃ cid loke paratra ca ||
GV06avpari_u:22.10.3a: putrārthī śrāvayen nityam acirāl labhate sutam |
GV06avpari_u:22.10.5c: na tasya mṛtyur na jarā nidrā vyādhir na caiva hi | kṣutpipāsābhayaṃ nāsti brahmabhūtaḥ sa tiṣṭhati ||
GV06avpari_u:23.1.1a: om athāto yajñapātrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yonir eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:23.1.1c: rūpaṃ tathā pramāṇaṃ ca kramenaiva prakathyate ||
GV06avpari_u:23.1.4a: bilvākṛtiś caruḥ proktas tāmro vā mṛnmayo 'pi vā |
GV06avpari_u:23.1.5a: kuśasyāmrasya vā parṇair veṇor vā balbajasya vā |
GV06avpari_u:23.1.5c: catuṣkoṇārdhavītaṃ ca loke śūrpaṃ tad ucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:23.2.1a: asiḥ khaḍgaṃ ca nistriṃśaḥ paryāyāḥ parikīrttitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.2.1c: tadākṛṭy eva yad rūpaṃ yajñe sphyaṃ ca vadanti tam ||
GV06avpari_u:23.2.2c: madhye hīnaṃ tathordhvāgraṃ vāraṇaṃ tad ulūkhalam ||
GV06avpari_u:23.2.4a: sruvas tu mūladaṇḍaś ca bilaṃ cāṅguṣṭhaparvaṇaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.2.5a: vaikaṅkatī dhruvā proktā sarvayajñeṣu yā smṛtā |
GV06avpari_u:23.3.2c: dvyaṅgulaḥ khātā ca bilād aṅgulaṃ caiva piṇḍikā | vṛttā vā caturaśrā vā sādhastāc chobhanā smṛtā] ||
GV06avpari_u:23.3.3c: bilaṃ vṛttaṃ sruco madhye daṇḍasthaulyaṃ bilārdhataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:23.3.4c: saptatriṃśad aṅgulāni sā sruk caiva prakīrtitā ||
GV06avpari_u:23.3.5a: bhinnā viśīrṇā vakrā ca klinnā ca sphuṭitā tathā |
GV06avpari_u:23.4.1c: unmūlye patite bhagne manasāpi na cintayet ||
GV06avpari_u:23.4.2c: sruvārthaṃ pātayed vṛkṣaṃ prātaḥ prāgraṃ ca saumyavāk ||
GV06avpari_u:23.4.3c: yat tasya carma tvak caiva tat kṛṣṇājinam ucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:23.4.5: aṅguṣṭhaparvāgramukhaṃ darvyākṛti tu mekṣaṇam. vaikaṅkate pālāśe vā prādeśas tu pramāṇataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:23.5.1a: alābu vaiṇavaṃ vāpi dārvyaṃ vaiṇavam eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:23.5.1c: akṣāv amaṇḍalau proktau yathā dṛṣṭaṃ pura rṣibhiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:23.5.2a: cakrābhyāṃ kāṣṭhasaṃghātaiḥ śilpibhiś caiva yat kṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:23.5.2c: loke prasiddhaṃ śakaṭam agniṣṭhaṃ yājñike vidhau ||
GV06avpari_u:23.5.3c: sauvīrādy añjanaṃ caiva atha vā daivikaṃ tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:23.5.4a: abhyañjanaṃ ca tat praktaṃ tilatailaṃ ca yad viduḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.6.1a: hastamātraṃ sruvaḥ khaḍgaṃ sakṛdāchinnam eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:23.6.1c: bāhumātrā juhūḥ proktā dhruvā barhis tathaiva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:23.6.2a: tāmraś caiva sruvaḥ proktaḥ khaḍgaṃ khādiram eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:23.6.2c: pālāśī ca juhūḥ kāryā idhmāś caiva viśeṣataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:23.6.5a: śamy aśvattha[ḥ] palāśaś ca khādiro 'tha vikaṅkataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.7.1a: eṣām alābhe vṛkṣāṇām anye grāhyās tu yājñikaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.7.3a: sāyaṃhomeṣu yad dravyaṃ prātarhomeṣu tad bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:23.7.3c: bhinnadravyahutaṃ yat tu na hutaṃ tasya tad bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:23.7.4c: kṣudhākāle tathāpy keke pakṣahomaṃ tu kārayet ||
GV06avpari_u:23.7.5a: yāyāvarāṇāṃ munibhiḥ pakṣahomas tu taiḥ smṛtaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.7.5c: yathā kathaṃ cid vacanaṃ śrutyuktaṃ dvija ācāret ||
GV06avpari_u:23.8.1c: pakṣahomaṃ tadā kuryān nistīrya satataṃ caret ||
GV06avpari_u:23.8.2c: ekā samit sakṛd dhomaḥ so 'rdhamāsāya kalpate ||
GV06avpari_u:23.8.3c: evaṃ gārhapatye ca dakṣiṇāgnau ca juhvati ||
GV06avpari_u:23.8.5a: ṛṣibhiś ca purā dṛṣṭam āpatkāleṣu sarvataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.9.1c: tatprayojanamātraṃ tu na doṣaḥ sūtakeṣu ca ||
GV06avpari_u:23.9.3c: eṣāṃ doṣo na vidyeta sāyamprātaḥ kriye sthite ||
GV06avpari_u:23.10.3a: aṅgulāni tu ṣaṭtriṃśad dhnvākṛtyā tu kārayet |
GV06avpari_u:23.10.3c: dakṣiṇāgnes tu vai kuṇḍaṃ vidvadbhij parikathyate ||
GV06avpari_u:23.10.4c: sabhyaṃ necchanti śālāgnau māhakiḥ kauśikas tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:23.10.5c: mantād eva tathā proktaṃ dravyaṃ yatra na dṛśyate ||
GV06avpari_u:23.10.6a: ājyaṃ tatra vijānīiyād dhomas tatra sruveṇa ca |
GV06avpari_u:23.10.7c: yajñe caiva aṅgabhūtāś ca pātramantrahavirdvijāḥ | carutbhiś ca kriyāḥ sarvāś cāturhotraṃ tad ucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:23.11.1a: yājñikās tu vadanty anye caturbhir yac ca hūyate |
GV06avpari_u:23.11.2a: durbhikṣe cākule bhaṅge ṛtvijāṃ cāpy asaṃbhave |
GV06avpari_u:23.11.3a: ṛtvijāṃ ca7apy asāmnidhye adhvaryus tat paṭhet svayam |
GV06avpari_u:23.11.4a: khāte lūne tu yac coktaṃ saṃskāraśrutihetubhiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.12.1a: kṛṣṇājinaṃ tilā darbhā mantrā ājyaṃ dvijottamāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.12.1c: doṣo na vidyate hy eṣāṃ yathārthaṃ saṃniyojayet ||
GV06avpari_u:23.12.5c: eṣām anujñām ādāya kuryād vaitānikī[ḥ] kriyāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:23.13.2a: sruk sruvaś ca dhruvā khaḍgaṃ musalolūkhalaṃ caruḥ |
GV06avpari_u:23.13.3a: pātraṃ grahāś ca camasā haviḥ śūrpaṃ kuśāsanam |
GV06avpari_u:23.13.3c: somaspṛṣṭaṃ ca yad bhāṇḍaṃ vāriśaucena śudhyati ||
GV06avpari_u:23.13.4c: avaśyaṃ tad dvijaiḥ kāryaṃ śreyaskāmais tu nityaśaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:23.13.5a: pātrānāṃ tu prasāṅgena yad anyat parikīrtitam |
GV06avpari_u:23.13.5c: sāyaṃ prātas tu homāṅgaṃ purā dṛṣṭaṃ maharṣibhiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:23.14.4a: niṣkāmo vā sakāmo vā vedoktaṃ yaḥ samācaret |
GV06avpari_u:23.14.4c: niṣkāmasya tu muktiḥ syāt sakāmaḥ phalam aśnute ||
GV06avpari_u:23.14.5a: niṣkāmeṇa tu yat kiṃ cit kartavyam iti vaidikam |
GV06avpari_u:23.14.5c: tat sarvaṃ muktidaṃ jñeyaṃ parāparaparaṃ sukham ||
GV06avpari_u:23.14.6a: na śokas tasya no vyādhir na mṛtyur na jarā tathā |
GV06avpari_u:23.14.6c: na kṣudhā na pipāsā ca amṛtātmā sa tiṣṭhati ||
GV06avpari_u:24.1.1a: om atha rṣiputrikāyāṃ tu sphutaṃ sarveṣu karmasu |
GV06avpari_u:24.1.5a: eṣā vai viparītā ca kāryā ghoreṣu karmasu |
GV06avpari_u:24.1.5c: karmaṇām anurūpāṃ tu vediṃ vakṣyāmy ataḥ param ||
GV06avpari_u:24.1.8a: dakṣiṇena tu yā vakrā yājñikaṃ sā vināśayet |
GV06avpari_u:24.1.8c: yā ca vakrottareṇa syād yajamānaṃ vināśayet ||
GV06avpari_u:24.1.9a: purastāt pṛṣṭhato vāpi madhyato viṣamā ca yā |
GV06avpari_u:24.1.9c: puram antaḥpuraṃ cāpi nāyakaṃ ca hinasti sā ||
GV06avpari_u:24.1.10c: viśeṣatas tu teṣv eva karmasv evābhidhāsyate ||
GV06avpari_u:24.2.2a: tatas tu yatnavān samyag agnāv upasamāhite |
GV06avpari_u:24.2.3a: śabdaṃ varṇaṃ ca gandhaṃ ca rūpaṃ snehaṃ prabhāṃ gatim |
GV06avpari_u:24.2.3c: sparśaṃ cāpi parīkṣeta agnāv iti viniścayaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:24.3.3a: huto 'pi saṃjvalaty eva snigdho viprasya dakṣiṇaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:24.4.2a: prahasann iva śabdena dyotayann iva tejasā |
GV06avpari_u:24.4.4a: arcibhir jvālabhāraiś ca pradahan dviṣatāṃ diśaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:24.4.4c: vidhūmaḥ kuṇḍalī yaḥ syād anulomaś ca siddhaye ||
GV06avpari_u:24.5.2: viśālamūle pṛthule ca madhye jñeyānale saṃprati pīḍitāgre | mṛṇālapadmānilatulyagandhe trisāgarāntā vasudhā nṛpasya ||
GV06avpari_u:24.5.4a: vibhrājate tv akhilarāgayuto hutāśo hastāvṛtaṃ kathayatīva jayaṃ nṛpasya
GV06avpari_u:24.5.5c: dātā nṛpāya vasudhāṃ tu himāṃśumaulijyotsnāvikāśitasamudrajalāṃ hutāśaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:24.6.1c: vaiśvānaro jvalati yasya viśuddhamūrtiḥ sa prāpnuyān nṛpaśatādhipatāṃ narendraḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:24.6.4c: āyāti tasya bhavanaṃ hy alidīptimālā savrīḍasūryakiraṇā kṣitipālalakṣmīr iti ||
GV06avpari_u:25.1.1a: oṃ śaunakaṃ tu sukhāsīnaṃ bhārgavaḥ paripṛcchati |
GV06avpari_u:25.1.1c: kuṇḍaṃ kasmin bhavet kīdṛk kasyāṃ vā diśi kiṃ phalam ||
GV06avpari_u:25.1.2a: sa tasmā upasannāya ācaṣṭe bhārgavāya tu |
GV06avpari_u:25.1.2c: kuṇḍaṃ yasmin bhaved yādṛg yasyāṃ vā diśi yat phalam ||
GV06avpari_u:25.1.5a: caturaśraṃ tu pūrvasyām aindreṣv api ca karmasu |
GV06avpari_u:25.1.6a: ardhacandraṃ tu yāmyāyāṃ yāmyeṣv api ca karmasu |
GV06avpari_u:25.1.6c: nairṛtyāṃ ca trikoṇaṃ syād abhicāravidhau śubham ||
GV06avpari_u:25.1.7a: vāruṇyāṃ vartulaṃ jñeyaṃ vāruṇyeṣv api karmasu |
GV06avpari_u:25.1.7c: vāyavyāṃ pañcakoṇaṃ tu vāyavyeṣv api karman ||
GV06avpari_u:25.1.8a: uttarasyāṃ tu padmābhaṃ saumyeṣv api ca karmasu |
GV06avpari_u:25.1.8c: aiśānyāṃ saptakoṇaṃ tu raudreṣv api yathoditam ||
GV06avpari_u:25.1.9a: sarvakarmasu vijñeyaṃ kuṇḍaṃ padmanibhaṃ tu yat |
GV06avpari_u:25.1.9c: caturaśraṃ tu sarvatra samaṃ syād vijayāvaham ||
GV06avpari_u:25.1.10c: śāntike caturaśraṃ ca pauṣṭike vartulaṃ tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:25.2.1a: na cet purastād dhīnaṃ syāt sukhaṃ yajñaḥ samāpyate |
GV06avpari_u:25.2.1c: yat tu dakṣiṇato 'hīnaṃ tad rājñas tv abhayapradam ||
GV06avpari_u:25.2.2a: yathāhīnaṃ paścimena bhavet tat siddhidaṃ śubham |
GV06avpari_u:25.2.2c: uttareṇa samamyat syāt tad rājño rājyavardhanam ||
GV06avpari_u:25.2.3a: madhye samaṃ ca sukhadaṃ digvidikṣu samaṃ tu yat |
GV06avpari_u:25.2.4a: na cet purastād ityādi ya eṣa kathito vidhiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:25.2.4c: maṇḍapānāṃ gṛhāṇāṃ ca māne śāntikaraḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:26.1.1a: oṃ samidhāṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi pramāṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śubham |
GV06avpari_u:26.1.3a: tiryag yavodarāṇy aṣṭāv ūrdhvā vā vrīhayas trayaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:26.1.4a: ata ūrdhvaṃ na kartavyā nāpi hrasvā na cordhvataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:26.1.4c: na vakrā caiva kartavyā nāpi granthisamanvitā ||
GV06avpari_u:26.1.5c: karoti yāge kṣipraṃ tu tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet ||
GV06avpari_u:26.2.1a: dviphalā piṇḍavarjāpi triphalā vāpi yā bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:26.2.2c: pauṣṭikaṃ karma kurvīta sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:26.2.5a: viśīrṇā dvidalā hrasvā vakrā caiva dvidhāgrataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:26.2.5c: kṛśā ca dīrghā sthūlā ca karmasiddhivināśinī ||
GV06avpari_u:26.2.6a: [yad yatra lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ yasmin kāle yathāvidhi |
GV06avpari_u:26.2.6c: tatra tenaiva siddhiḥ syād viparīte tathā bhayam] ||
GV06avpari_u:26.2.7: samāhṛtānāṃ samidhāṃ tāsāṃ caiva phalaṃ śṛṇu ||
GV06avpari_u:26.3.2a: sthūlā tu kurute vighnaṃ sarvakārye dvijasya tu |
GV06avpari_u:26.3.2c: ataḥ pramāṇaṃ vividhaṃ phalaṃ cāpi tathā śṛṇu ||
GV06avpari_u:26.3.3c: kṣīrāktā śāntike home hotavyā tu viśeṣataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:26.4.1c: uccāṭane praśastā sā dvidalā ca na śāntaye ||
GV06avpari_u:26.4.2c: sarvato granthihīnā tu viprāṇāṃ syāt samic chubhā ||
GV06avpari_u:26.4.4a: trayāṇām api vakṣyante yā grāhyāḥ samidhaḥ smṛtaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:26.4.5c: samidhām indhanānāṃ ca tulyān vṛkṣān bravīmy ataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:26.4.6a: śuṣukair yā indhanaiḥ pūrvaṃ yajñavṛkṣamayaiḥ śubhaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:26.4.6c: ārdrāṇi homayec caiva śuṣkaiḥ kalahakarmaṇi | śuṣkāṇi hīndhanāni syuḥ samidhas tu yathoditāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:26.5.1: puṣṭikāmaḥ palāśasya gṛhṇīyāc chāntikarmaṇi udumbarasya vittārthī vaṭāśvatthasya rājyadhīḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:26.5.2c: vidveṣaṃ kaṭukaiḥ kuryāt kaṇṭakair maraṇaṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:26.5.3a: kakubhaṃ kaṭabhaṃ vṛkṣaṃ kauvirālaṃ tu kauhakam |
GV06avpari_u:26.5.3c: vaṃśaṃ vibhītakaṃ śigruṃ vidyād uccāṭane hitān ||
GV06avpari_u:26.5.5a: punnāgacampakau vṛkṣā ye cānye kṣīriṇaḥ śubhāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:26.5.5c: yad yatra lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ yasmin kāle yathāvidhi ||
GV06avpari_u:26.5.6a: tatra tenaiva siddhiḥ syād viparīte tathā bhayam |
GV06avpari_u:26.5.8a: śataṃ sahasraṃ lakṣaṃ vā gāyatryā paramāhutiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:26.5.8c: hūyamānaṃ tu yat kiṃ cit kṛtānnaṃ yadi vā tilāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:26.5.9c: eṣabhedo mayākhyātaḥ śubhasya tv aśubhasya ca ||
GV06avpari_u:26.5.10a: yathoktam etad yaḥ kuryāt sa sarvaphalam āpnuyād iti ||
GV06avpari_u:27.1.1: oṃ sauvarṇarājatais tāmraiḥ kāṃsyair draumais tathāyasaiḥ | sruvaiḥ sarvaguṇopetaiḥ karma kuryād yathākramam ||
GV06avpari_u:27.1.2c: kāṃsyena rudhiraṃ māṃsaṃ nānyaj juhuvīta kiṃ cana ||
GV06avpari_u:27.1.4c: dhunvan hi hanti putrān tu rākṣasā sphuṭitāhutiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:27.1.5a: nānyat kiṃ cid abhidhyāyed uddhṛtyānyata āhutim |
GV06avpari_u:27.1.5c: tad daivatam abhidhyāyed āhutir yasya hūyate ||
GV06avpari_u:27.2.1a: sruve pūrṇe japen mantram uttānaṃ śāntike karam |
GV06avpari_u:27.2.1c: śāntike pauṣṭike caiva varjayet tu kanīnikām ||
GV06avpari_u:27.2.3a: dīrgho hinasti rājānaṃ hrasva rtvijaṃ vināśayet |
GV06avpari_u:27.2.5c: gopathena yathāśāstram uddhṛtaṃ śruticodanāt | sruveṇa kurute karma hastenāpi tathā śṛṇu ||
GV06avpari_u:28.1.1a: oṃ yadā juhoti hastena dakṣiṇenetareṇa vā |
GV06avpari_u:28.1.1c: tadā vakṣye vidhiṃ tasya śreyasī syād yathāhutiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:28.1.2a: yathā naśyati caivāsya karma guhyam ajānataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:28.1.3c: homakarma tataḥ kuryāt spṛṣṭvā vāmena dakṣiṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:28.1.5a: uddhṛtya samidho 'nnaṃ vā pañcabhir juhuyād budhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:28.1.5c: śanaiś ca nirvaped annaṃ madhye 'gnau susamāhitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:28.2.1a: gṛhakarmaṇi yajñe vā tathā pañcabhir eva tu |
GV06avpari_u:28.2.1c: śāntike pauṣṭike vaiva varjayet tu kanīnikām ||
GV06avpari_u:28.2.2a: tisṛbhir juhuyād annaṃ na tilān naiva taṇḍulān |
GV06avpari_u:28.2.2c: yadābhicārikaṃ kiṃ cit tasmin kāle prayojayet ||
GV06avpari_u:28.2.3c: nirdiṣṭaṃ tisṛbhiḥ śūlaṃ tena śatruṃ nipātayet ||
GV06avpari_u:28.2.4a: apasavyena hastena savyaṃ yadi juhoti tat |
GV06avpari_u:28.2.4c: savyena cāpasavyaṃ tu [savyaṃ yadi juhoti tat] ||
GV06avpari_u:29.1.2c: aśubhaṃ yac chubhaṃ vāpi lakṣaṇaṃ pāvakasya tu ||
GV06avpari_u:29.1.3: sa pṛṣṭas tena tat sarvam ācacakṣe mahāmatiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:29.1.4c: snigdhaś ca kiṃśukābhaś ca siddhis tatra vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:29.2.1c: tadā śāntiṃ vijānīyād viparīte tathā bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:29.2.2c: prāyaścittiṃ tadākuryād yad uktaṃ kauśikena tu ||
GV06avpari_u:29.2.3a: athāpy āliṅgate bhūmiṃ bhramate ca samantataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:29.2.3c: aśubhaṃ kathayet tatra hotre 'sau pāvakaḥ svayam ||
GV06avpari_u:29.2.5a: yadāgnau lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ cid aśubhaṃ tu pradṛśyate |
GV06avpari_u:29.2.5c: hotā kleśam avāpnoti śāntiṃ tatra prayojayet ||
GV06avpari_u:30.1.1a: oṃ śaunakaṃ tu sukhāsīnaṃ gautamaḥ paripṛcchati |
GV06avpari_u:30.1.1c: lakṣahomasya yat puṇyam āhutīnāṃ ca devatāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:30.1.3a: agnyāgārasya yā bhūmis tāṃ pravakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:30.1.3c: śuddhākṣārā samā snigdhā yā ca pūrvottaraplavā ||
GV06avpari_u:30.1.6a: upoṣya caikarātraṃ ca gāyatryā ayutaṃ japet |
GV06avpari_u:30.1.6c: upoṣya caiva gāyatryā japeyur ayutaṃ budhāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:30.2.1a: te śuklavāsasaḥ snātāḥ sragbhir gandhair alaṃkṛtāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:30.2.2a: kauśam āsanam āsīnāḥ prayuñjyur homam uttamam |
GV06avpari_u:30.2.3a: agne praihy agninā rayim ity upasthāpya pāvakam |
GV06avpari_u:30.3.1c: anaḍvān kāñcanaṃ vastraṃ tuṣyeyur yena vā dvijāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:30.3.2a: yavais tu vipulān bhogān dhānyair āyuṣyam eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:30.3.2c: tilair hutvā tu tejasvī āyuḥ kīrtiṃ ca vardhate ||
GV06avpari_u:30.3.4c: hutvaitāṃś caturo lakṣān brahmalokaṃ sa gacchati ||
GV06avpari_u:30.3.5a: yāvaj jīvati kartāsau tāvat putrān dhanaṃ śriyam |
GV06avpari_u:30.3.5c: pūrṇe kāle vimānena nīyate paramaṃ padam ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.1a: om atha kāṅkāyano bhagavantam atharvāṇaṃ papraccha ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.1c: bhagavan kena vidhānena koṭihomaṃ lakṣahomam ayutahomaṃ vā prārambhamāṇaḥ katham ṛtvijo vṛṇīte kathaṃ ca kuryus tasmai sa hovāca ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.2_0: brāhmaṇo vā rājā vā vaiśyo vā grāmo vā janapado vā śrīkāmaḥ śāntikāmaḥ koṭihomaṃ lakṣahomam ayutahomaṃ vāhaṃ kariṣyāmīti
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.2_1: tasyā samāpter bhavadbhir amāṃsāśibhir brahmacāribhir haviṣyabhugbhir bhavitavyam
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.3: tais tatheti uktaḥ kuṇḍam ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ caturhastam aṣṭahastaṃ vā [samastahastaṃ vā dīrghaṃ vā] daśahastaṃ khānayet tathā ca bādariḥ
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.4a: lakṣahome tu kartavyam aṣṭahastaṃ na saṃśayaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.4c: dvihastaṃ vā prakurvīta caturhastam athāpi vā ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.5a: kuṇḍaṃ vā daśahastaṃ tu dvivistāraṃ tathottaram |
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.5c: na cet purastād dhīnaṃ syāt sukhaṃ yajñaḥ samāpyate ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.7c: madhye vihīnaṃ yad kuṇḍaṃ prajākṣayakaraṃ viduḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.8a: sraktihīnaṃ tu yat kuṇḍaṃ tad apy aśubhadaṃ bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.10a: prathamā sāttvikī proktā dvitīyā rājasī smṛtā |
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.11c: aṣṭāṅgulaṃ bhaved vṛttaṃ nirvāhas tu ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.14_0: tasmād yatnena kuṇḍaṃ khātvādbhir abhyukṣya purastād agner ādityādīn grahān pratiṣṭhāpyottarataḥ kṛttikādīni nakṣatrāṇi svāsu
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.14_1: dikṣu lokapālān sarvāsu kuṇḍasraktiṣv agnyādidevān ratiṣṭhāpya
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.15a: teṣāṃ pratimantram āvāhanādikaṃ kṛtvā vilīnapūtam ājyaṃ
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.15c: gṛhītvā sruvaṃ srucaṃ ca saṃmṛjya pratapyedhmam upasamādhāyānvārabdhāya vāstoṣpatyādibhiś caturbhir gaṇaiḥ śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kartāram ācāmayati ca saṃprokṣati ca ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.16a: atha samidho ghṛtāktās tilān vā svāhākāravatīḥ
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.16c: saṃkhyāvatyo gāyatryā mahāvyāhṛtibhir vā sarva ṛtvijo juhvati ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.1.17: śrīparṇamiśrāḥ śrīkāmasya śamīparṇamiśrāḥ śāntikāmasya karīrasaktumiśrā vṛṣṭikāmaysa badarādiphalamiśrāḥ paśukāmasya ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.1: aharahaḥ karmaṇo 'pavargād atha pūrṇāyāṃ koṭyāṃ lakṣe vāyute vānvārabdhe yajamāne niśi mahābhiṣEkaṃ kṛtvā vasor dhāraṃ juhvati
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.2: audumbarīṃ srucaṃ śuraḥpramāṇāṃ brāhmaṇasya lalātapramāṇāṃ kṣatriyasya skandhapramāṇāṃ vaiṣyasyāpramāṇāṃ janapadasya
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.3: teṣām ante saraṇārthaṃ nimnaṃ khānayitvoṣṇodakena prakṣālyājyam ānīya vasor dhārāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ prāpnoti ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.4: tad yad ājyadhānīṃ ca vaiśvānaraṃ prāpnoti athoccārayati
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.5_0: ojaś ca me kṣatraṃ ca me ye agnayo amo devavadhebhyo bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ prāṇāya nama iti hutvā arghaṃ pradāya vastraṃ lodhraṃ
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.5_1: mālyaṃ phalādīni bhājane kṛtvā namas te astu paśyata iti svāhākāreṇāgnau prakṣipya yamyaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate so 'smai kāmaḥ samṛdhyate
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.5_2: (AVParis_30b,2.6) samṛddhihomādi samānaṃ svastyayanāni japet puṇyāhaṃ vācayed gobhūtilasuvarṇaṃ vāsaś ca rtvigbhyaḥ saṃpradāya
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.7a: tasminn ahani vyatīte yadi strī mālyahastā
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.7c_0: śvetacandanāniliptā śvetapuṣpāṇy ādāya prayacched gaurasarṣapān pāṇyādhāre vā gṛhītvā prāsādam ārohayet kuñjaraṃ vā pramattam
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.7c_1: aśvaṃ śvetaṃ vā parvataṃ govṛṣaṃ vā yānaṃ yuktaṃ vājibhir yady ārohet svapnakāle samastasiddhiṃ vidyān manaso yām abhīṣṭām ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.8_0: tasmāt tāṃ rātrīṃ prayataḥ svapet || svapnaṃ dṛṣṭvā rtvigbhyo nivedayet || paro 'pehi yo na jībo 'si vidma te svapna yathā
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.8_1: kalāṃ yathā śapham iti rājamukham abhimantrya yathāgataṃ gaccheyus tad api ślokāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.9c: koṭihomaṃ viduḥ prājñā lakṣaṃ vāyutam eva vā ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.10a: avijñātaṃ ca yat pāpaṃ sahasā caiva yat kṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.10c: tat sarvaṃ lakṣahomasya karaṇād dhi vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:30b.2.11c: yaḥ kuryāt prayato nityaṃ na so 'narthān samaśnute ||
GV06avpari_u:31.1.1a: oṃ devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva pīḍyamānā mahāsūraiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:31.1.1c: mṛtyunā vyādhibhiś caiva brahmāṇam idam abruvan ||
GV06avpari_u:31.1.2a: karmaṇā kena deveśa mṛtyur vyādhiś ca jīyate |
GV06avpari_u:31.1.2c: aiśvaryaṃ prāpyate vāpi sthānaṃ ca paramaṃ prabho ||
GV06avpari_u:31.1.4a: śṛṇudhvaṃ prayatāḥ sarve prāpyate yena karmaṇā |
GV06avpari_u:31.1.4c: aiśvaryam āyur ārogyaṃ putrā vijaya eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:31.1.5c: ye japanti sadā tebhyo na bhayaṃ vidyate kva cit ||
GV06avpari_u:31.2.1a: tayā homaś ca kartavyaḥ satataṃ siddhim icchatā |
GV06avpari_u:31.2.1c: yavais tilaiḥ samidbhiś ca vrīhibhiḥ sarṣapais tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:31.2.2a: atha cen mahatīṃ siddhiṃ prārthayedhvaṃ surottamāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:31.2.3a: yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān pūrvam atharvā tryambakasya tu |
GV06avpari_u:31.2.4c: kuruṣva mama tat karma mahattvaṃ yena labhyate ||
GV06avpari_u:31.2.5a: aiśvaryam āyur ārogyaṃ sthānaṃ ca paramaṃ prabho |
GV06avpari_u:31.2.5c: putrā lakṣmīr yaśo medhā balaṃ pauruṣyam eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:31.3.1c: gāyatrīṃ tapasā yuktām ṛcaḥ padam itīti ha ||
GV06avpari_u:31.3.2: [ṛcaḥ padaṃ mātrayeti mantre vijñāyate hi sā |] gāyatrī vai tripād brahma viśvarūpā ca saṃsthitā ||
GV06avpari_u:31.3.4c: tato mahattvam agamad aiśaryaṃ paramaṃ tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:31.3.5a: mahādeva iti cāsya nāma lokeṣu viśrutam |
GV06avpari_u:31.3.5c: upadravāś ca ye ke cid upaghātās tathaiva ca | sarve 'sya praśamaṃ yātāḥ skandaṃ putraṃ ca labdhavān ||
GV06avpari_u:31.4.1a: tataḥ prītas tu bhagavāñ śaṃkaraḥ paryapṛcchata |
GV06avpari_u:31.4.2c: sāvitraṃ tena homo 'yaṃ kṛto me koṭisaṃmitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:31.4.3c: yatprayogād bhavec chāntir vṛddhiś ca paramā nṛṇām ||
GV06avpari_u:31.5.1a: ārambhaṃ tasya kurvīta śukle cāpi tithau śubhe |
GV06avpari_u:31.5.2a: rohiṇyāṃ vaiṣṇave tvāṣṭre pauṣṇe maitrottareṣu ca |
GV06avpari_u:31.5.3a: atha cet tvarate kartuṃ koṭihomaṃ mahāphalam |
GV06avpari_u:31.5.6c: tāvat kuryād budhaḥ sarvaṃ yāvan no nairṛtaṃ kṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:31.6.1c: nirmathya hāvayet tatra samidho brāhmaṇān bahūn ||
GV06avpari_u:31.6.2a: śataṃ sahasraṃ koṭiṃ vā viṃśatir daśa vā dvijāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:31.6.3a: svayaṃ vāpi yajed brahmā savitāraṃ dinedine |
GV06avpari_u:31.6.4c: samidbhiḥ sarvakāmas tu bilvaiḥ prāpnoti kāñcanam ||
GV06avpari_u:31.6.5a: labhate śriyam agryāṃ tu padmais tejo ghṛtena tu |
GV06avpari_u:31.6.5c: dadhnā tu labhate putrān payasā brahmavarcasam ||
GV06avpari_u:31.7.3a: pratyekaṃ caiva hotṝṇāṃ dātavyā dakṣiṇā tataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:31.7.3c: niṣko aśvo gaur vāsaś ca hiraṇyaṃ vāpi śaktitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:31.7.4a: yaś caivāpi bhaved brahmā prayoktā sarvakarmaṇām |
GV06avpari_u:31.7.4c: sarvasvaṃ tasya deyaṃ syād dhiraṇyaṃ vāpi tatsamam ||
GV06avpari_u:31.7.5a: koṭihome samāpte tu yajed grahagaṇān budhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:31.7.5c: kārayed amṛtāṃ caiva ghṛtakambalam eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:31.8.1c: paracakrāgame tv aindrī ghṛtakambala[m] eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:31.8.4a: āmnātaṃ tatra yat karma tad ante kārayed budhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:31.8.4c: eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭo abhicāre vidhīyate ||
GV06avpari_u:31.8.5c: ārambhaṃ tasya ghoreṣu nakṣatreṣu dineṣu ca ||
GV06avpari_u:31.8.6c: maghāśleṣā tathā mūlaṃ revaty ārdrā ca sarvadā ||
GV06avpari_u:31.9.1a: darbhārthe tu śarān kuryād ghṛtārthe tailam ucyate |
GV06avpari_u:31.9.1c: svāhākāre tu phaṭkāro veṇyādyāḥ syuś caturdaśa ||
GV06avpari_u:31.9.2a: cāṇḍālāgnau citāgnau vā sūtikāgnāv athāpi vā |
GV06avpari_u:31.9.4c: tāpayet pratilomāṃ tu sāvitrīṃ manasā japet ||
GV06avpari_u:31.9.5a: kaṇṭhe śūlārpitāṃ kṛtvā tāpayet tu dinedine |
GV06avpari_u:31.9.5c: yāvac chatrur vaśaṃ yāti vilīnāyāṃ vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:31.10.1c: prītimān ucyate yena tac chubhaṃ bhautikaṃ dadau ||
GV06avpari_u:31.10.2a: atharvā bhautikaṃ labdhvā śiṣyebhyas tat punar dadau |
GV06avpari_u:31.10.2c: śubhaṃ mokṣakaraṃ puṇyaṃ priyaṃ paśupater vratam ||
GV06avpari_u:31.10.3a: etaj jñātvā tu yaḥ samyak koṭihomaṃ prayojayet |
GV06avpari_u:31.10.3c: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti brahmalokaṃ sa gacchati ||
GV06avpari_u:31.10.4a: yas tv imaṃ śrāvayed vidvān paṭhate caiva sarvadā |
GV06avpari_u:31.10.5c: hitārtham uddhṛto granthaḥ koṭihomas tu viśrutaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.1: oṃ bhūs tat savituḥ śaṃ no devīḥ śāntā dyauḥ śaṃ na indrāgnī śaṃ no vāto vātu uṣā apa svasus tama iti śāntigaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.2_0: kṛtyāpratiharaṇo dūṣyā dūṣir asi īśānāṃ tvā samaṃ jyotir uto asy abandhukṛd ye purastāt suparṇas tvā yāṃ te cakruḥ pratīcīnaphalo
GV06avpari_u:32.2_1: yad duṣkṛtam ayaṃ pratisaro yāṃ kalpayantīti kṛtyāpratiharaṇāni || iti kṛtyāgaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.3_0: cātanaḥ stuvānam idaṃ havir ye 'māvāsyām upa prāgān niḥsālām arāyakṣayaṇaṃ śaṃ no devī pṛśniparṇy ā paśyati tānt satyaujās
GV06avpari_u:32.3_1: tvayā pūrvaṃ purastād yukto antardāve juhuta prāgnaye rakṣohaṇam ity anuvākaś cātanāni || iti cātanagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.4: mātṛnāmā divyo gandharva ā paśyatīmaṃ me agne yau te māteti mātṛnāmāni || iti mātṛgaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.5_0: vāstoṣpatīya āśānām āśāpālebhya ihaiva dhruvām ṛdhaṅmantro yonim uta putraḥ pitaram indrasya gṛho 'sīti catasro dive svāhāśamavarma
GV06avpari_u:32.5_1: me pṛthivyai śrotrāyeti dhanvānīti dve ūrjaṃ bibhrad iti ṣaṭsatyaṃ bṛhad ity anuvāko vāstoṣpatīyāni || iti vāstugaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.6: pāpmahā vi devā jarasāvṛtam apa naḥ śośucad agham ava mā pāpmann iti pāpmahā || iti pāpmahā gaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.7a_0: takmanāśano jarāyujaḥ prathamo yad agnir ud agātāṃ daśavṛkṣa muñca kṣetriyāt tvā hariṇasya raghuṣyado muñcāmi tvā bhavāśarvau
GV06avpari_u:32.7a_1: manve vāṃ yo giriṣu dive svāhāgnis takmānam agner ivāsyāva mā pāpmant
GV06avpari_u:32.7c: sṛjāva jyām iva varaṇo vārayātā imaṃ yavaṃ vidradhasya balāsasya namo rūrāyeti dve śīrṣaktiṃ śīrṣāmayam iti takmanāśanāni || iti takmanāśanagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.8_0: duḥsvapnanāśanāni dauṣvapnyaṃ daurjīvityaṃ paro 'paihi yo na jīvo 'si pary āvarte duṣvapnyād yat svapne annam aśnami yo na
GV06avpari_u:32.8_1: stāyad dipsati yo naḥ suptāṃ jāgrato yan me manso duṣvapnyaṃ kāma svapnaṃ suptvā vidma te svapneti trayaḥ paryāyā duḥsvapnanāśanāni ||
GV06avpari_u:32.9a: āyuṣyo yathā dyauḥ prāṇāpānāv ojo 'si tubhyam evākṣībhyāṃ te muñcāmi tvota devā āvatas ta upa priyam antakāya mṛtyava ā rabhasva
GV06avpari_u:32.9c: prāṇāya namo viṣāsahim ity āyuṣyāṇi || iti āyuṣyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.10_0: varcasyo ye triṣaptā asmin vasu prātar agniṃ hastivarcasaṃ siṃhe vyāghre yaśo havir yaśasaṃ mendro girāv aragarāṭeṣu yathā
GV06avpari_u:32.10_1: somaḥ prātaḥsavane yac ca varco akṣeṣu yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam iti varcasyāni || iti varcasyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.11_0: svastyayano amūḥ pāre pātaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ yena soma namo devavadhebhyo 'bhayaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv upa prāgāt
GV06avpari_u:32.11_1: sahasrākṣo 'namitraṃ no adharād yamomṛtyur bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu tyam ū ṣu trātāram indraḥ sutrāmā sa sutrāmā ā mandrair
GV06avpari_u:32.11_2: indra marmāṇi te varma me dyāvāpṛthivī aindrāgnaṃ varma girayas te yat te madhyaṃ yās te prācīr mā naḥ paścād iti svastyayanāni ||
GV06avpari_u:32.11_3: iti svastyayanagaṇaḥ (AVParis_32,12) abhayaḥ svastidā viśāṃ brāhmaṇena paryuktāsi na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo abhayaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv
GV06avpari_u:32.11_4: abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī asmai grāmāya hataṃ tardaṃ pūṣemā āśā indraḥ sutrāmā maitaṃ panthāṃ svastidā viśāṃ patir nama te ghoṣiṇībhya
GV06avpari_u:32.11_5: ā te rāṣṭram idam uc chreyo yata indra bhayāmaha ity abhayāni || ity abhayagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.13a: aparājito vidmā śarasya mā no cidann adārasṛt svastidā saṃśitaṃ me tvayā manyo yas te manyo etā devasenā avamanyur nirhastaḥ pari
GV06avpari_u:32.13c: vartmāny abhibhūr indro jāyaty abhi tvendrety aparājitāni || ity aparājitagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.14a: śarmavarmā yaḥ sapatna itaś ca yad amutaś cāpendra dviṣato
GV06avpari_u:32.14c_0: yūyaṃ naḥ pravata imam agna āyuṣe tisro devīr uruvyacā no indrasya śarmāsīti uttamāṃ varjayitvā yena devā asurāṇām anaḍudbhyas
GV06avpari_u:32.14c_1: tvam iti dve tanūṣ ṭe vājin vājasya nu prasave devānāṃ patnīr adhi brūhi rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinaṃ ye srāktyaṃ varma me dyāvāpṛṭhivī
GV06avpari_u:32.14c_2: aindrāgnaṃ varma bahulaṃ varma mahyam ayaṃ mitraḥ pṛthivyod akrāmad aspatnaṃ purastād iti śarmavarmā ||
GV06avpari_u:32.15a: devapurā ye purastād brahma jajñānaṃ sahasradhāra evāgnir mā pātu agniṃ te vasuvantaṃ mitraḥ pṛthivyod akrāmad apa ny adhuḥ
GV06avpari_u:32.15c: pauruṣeyaṃ vadhaṃ jitam asmākam iti devapurīyaḥ || iti devapurīyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.16: rudro ye 'syāṃ prācī dig itirudragaṇaḥ || iti rudragaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.17a_0: raudro rudra jalāṣabheṣaja ye 'syāṃ prācī dig ud itas trayo akraman bhavāśarvau manve vāṃ brahma jajñānam anāptā ye sahasradhāra
GV06avpari_u:32.17a_1: eva grīṣmo hemanto anaḍudbhyas tvaṃ mahyam āpo vaiśvānaro yamo mṛtyur yāṃ te rudra yo agnau rudro bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ bhavāśarvāv
GV06avpari_u:32.17c: sarpo vṛścikas tasmai prācyā diśo antardeśād iti raudragaṇaḥ || iti raudragaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.18_0: citrāgaṇo mā no vidann adārasṛt svastidā viśām amūhoāre aghadviṣṭā agne yat te tapa iti pañca sūktāni rudra jalāṣabheṣaja
GV06avpari_u:32.18_1: ye 'syāṃ prācī dig vi devā uta devā agner manva itiprabhṛtīni mṛgārasūktāny uttamaṃ varjayitvāpa naḥ śośucad aghaṃ pṛthivyām
GV06avpari_u:32.18_2: agnaye mamāgne vrahma jajñānam anāptā ye sahasradhāre savitā prasavānāṃ nava prāṇān pātaṃ nas tvaṣṭā me yena soma namo devavadhebhyo
GV06avpari_u:32.18_3: 'bhayaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv upa prāgāt sahasrākṣaḥ siṃhe vyāghre 'bhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī grīṣmo hemanto 'naḍudbhyas tvaṃ mahyam āpo
GV06avpari_u:32.18_4: vaiśvānaro yamo mṛtyur abhi tvendra viśvajit trāyamāṇāyai imaṃ me agne viṣāṇā pāśān śakadhūmaṃ somārudreti dve bṛhaspatir
GV06avpari_u:32.18_5: nas tyam ū ṣu trātāram indraḥ sutrāmā ā mandrair indra marmāṇi te antakāya mṛtyavā ā rabhasvāyaṃ pratisaro 'yaṃ me varaṇo
GV06avpari_u:32.18_6: bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ prāṇāya namo 'gniṃ brūma ity arthasūktaṃ satyaṃ bṛhad iti dve prathame girayas te yat te madhyaṃ yās
GV06avpari_u:32.18_7: te prācīr mā naḥ paścād grīṣmas te bhūme varṣāṇy upasthās te bhūme mātaḥ sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho jātavedā mā pra gāma patho
GV06avpari_u:32.18_8: yo yajñasya tasmai prācyā diśo antardeśād iti paryāyaś citrāgaṇaḥ || iti citrāgaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.19: patnīvanto aditir dyauḥ sinīvāli kuhūṃ devīm iti trīṇi sūktāni patnīvantaḥ || iti patnīvantagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.20a_0: svasti mātra indra juṣasvāyā viṣṭhā śive te stāṃ pādābhyāṃ te saṃ te śirṣṇo vatso virāja ity ekā uccā patantam iti dve bhūyān
GV06avpari_u:32.20a_1: indro viṣāsahiṃ sahamānam ity ādityagaṇaḥ śaṃ no devī śaṃ na indrāgnī śaṃ no vāto vātu śāntā dyauḥ
GV06avpari_u:32.20c_0: svasti mātra indra juṣasvāyā viṣṭhā śive te stāṃ pādābhyāṃ te saṃ te śirṣṇo vatso virāja ity ekā uccā patantam iti dve bhūyān
GV06avpari_u:32.20c_1: indro viṣāsahiṃ sahamānam ity ādityagaṇaḥ pippalādiśāntigaṇaḥ || iti pippalā[di]śāntigaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.21: gane yad iti pañca sūktāni pañcāpatyāni bhavanti pāñcajanyāni bhavanti pāñcāpatyo gaṇaḥ || iti pañcāpatyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.22a: ambayo yanti śambhumayobhubhyāṃ brahma jajñānam asya
GV06avpari_u:32.22c: vāmasya yo rohita ud asya krtavo mūrdhāham iti dve sūkte viṣāsahim iti salilagaṇaḥ || iti salilagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.24: aghadviṣṭā devajātā śaṃ no devī varaṇo vārayā[tai] pippalī vidradhasya yā babhrava iti gaṇakarmā gaṇo bhaisajyaś ca bhavati || iti bhaiṣajyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.25: ayaṃ te yonir ā no bhara dhītī vā ya ity arthasūktam utthāpano gaṇaḥ || ity utthāpanagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.26_0: ambayo yanti śambhumayobhū hiraṇyavarṇā niḥsālāṃ ye agnayo brahma jajñānam ity ekaita devā mṛgārasūktāny uttamaṃ varjayitvāpa
GV06avpari_u:32.26_1: naḥ śośucad aghaṃ punantu mā sasruṣīr himavataḥ pra sravanti vāyog pūtaḥ pavitreṇa śaṃ ca no mayaś ca no 'naḍudbhyas tvaṃ
GV06avpari_u:32.26_2: mahyam āpo vaiśvānaro raśmibhir yamo mṛtyur viśvajit saṃjñānaṃ no yady antarikṣe punar maitv indriyaṃ śivā naḥ śaṃ no vāto
GV06avpari_u:32.26_3: vātu agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn iti śāntigaṇaḥ || iti sarvaiḥ sūktaiḥ kauśikoktabṛhacchāntigaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.27: ambayo yanti śambhumayobhū hiraṇyavarṇā uta devā yady antarikṣe punar naitv indriyaṃ śivā naḥ śaṃ no vāto vātv agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn iti śāntātīyo laghuśāntigaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.28: ye triṣaptā mamāgne varcaḥ prātar agniṃ girāv aragarāṭeṣu divas pṛthivyā hastivarcasaṃ siṃhe vyāghre yaśo havir yas te gandha iti tisṛbhir varcasyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.29: yā asurā manuṣyā mā no vidan namo devavadhebhya ity abhayagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:32.31a: [ya] āśānām āśāpālebhyo agner manva iti sapta sūktāni yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr vaiśvānaro na ā gamac chumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī yad
GV06avpari_u:32.31c: arvācī[na]m agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn iti muñcantu nā bhavāśārvā yā devīr yan mātalī rathakrītam ity etāś catasro varjayitvā aṃholiṅgagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:33.1.13: athendro ha vā asuraiḥ parājitaś cintām āpede
GV06avpari_u:33.1.4a: taṃ savitābravīt prāyaścittaṃ kuruṣvāpratiruddho bhaviṣyasīti (AVParis_33,1.5) tam indro 'bravīt || bhagavan tvam evāpratiruddhaḥ
