GV06avpari_u:51.4.3c: āgantur jayati vadhaś ca nāgarāṇāṃ trailokyam <ca> bhayam upaiti guros tu ghāte ||
GV06avpari_u:51.4.4a: yo rājā prathitaparākramaḥ pṛthivyāṃ vaṅgāṅgādiṣu madadhāḥ saśūrasenāḥ
GV06avpari_u:51.4.4c: ye yodhāḥ samaraṇabhumilabdhaśabdās te sainyaiḥ kṣayam upayānti śukraghāte ||
GV06avpari_u:51.4.5a: mahiṣakavṛṣabhāḥ sabhasmapauṇḍrāḥ kṛṣipaśupālyaratāś ca ye manuṣyāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:51.4.5c: vividhabhayasamāhitās tu sarve kṣayam upayānti śanaiścarasya ghāte ||
GV06avpari_u:51.5.1a: ye ke cin nṛpatiṣu dāmbhikāḥ piśācāḥ kāryāṇāṃ vrataniyameṣu channapāpāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:51.5.1c: ye cānye śabarapulindacedigādhā bādhyante yadi bhavate 'tra rāhughātaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:51.5.2a: ākrāntaṃ samanubhavanti yāyisaṃghā vadhyante yadi bhavate [paras] paro 'highātaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:51.5.2c: saṃgrāmāḥ sarudhirapāṃsuvarṣamiśra durbhikṣaṃ bhavati tu ketupīḍanena ||
GV06avpari_u:51.5.3a: yat kiṃ cid divigatam antarikṣajaṃ vā bhaumaṃ vā bhavati nimittam apraśastam |
GV06avpari_u:51.5.3c: tat savaṃ stanitamahābhrabidyudvarṣaiḥ śāntaṃ syād bhavati sadakṣiṇaiś ca homaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:51.5.4a: ye deśā grahagaṇabhinnabhūmikampā yeṣāṃ vā graha upayātacandrasūryaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:51.5.5a: prasavyas triṣu māseṣu saṃsargo māsikaḥ smṛtaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:51.5.5c: lekhane pakṣa ity āhur bhedane saptarātrikam ||
GV06avpari_u:51.5.6a: āgneyā vāsavāś caiva vāyavyā vāruṇās tathā |
GV06avpari_u:51.5.6c: sarva eva śubhā jñeyā gargasya vacanaṃ yathā ||
GV06avpari_u:52.1.1a: om atharvāṇaṃ namaskṛtya uvāca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.1.1c: kīdṛśā grahaputrāś ca kiyanto vā vadasva me ||
GV06avpari_u:52.1.2a: pṛṣṭaha sa śaunakenātha brāhmaṇānāṃ hitāya vai |
GV06avpari_u:52.1.4a: pṛthikcarāś ca ye tatra te ca syuḥ saṃghacāriṇaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.2.3a: śuklā nikarāḥ saurābhās tyajanta iva cārciṣaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.2.3c: sphuranta iva cākāśe bimbakā raśmibhir vṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.2.5a: ye śvetāḥ kiṃcid ākṛṣṇā viśikhāḥ syur vitārakāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.2.5c: te ṣaṣṭiḥ kanakā nāma śanaiścarasutā grahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.3.2c: triśikhā vā tribhāgā vā ṣaṣṭir ity uttare pathi ||
GV06avpari_u:52.3.3c: śatam ekādhikaṃ mṛtyoḥ putrāḥ syur dhūmaketavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.3.4c: rāhoḥ putrās trayas triṃśad grahās tāmasakīlakāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.3.5c: viśvarūpāḥ sutā agner grahā viṃśaṃ śataṃ smṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:52.4.1a: aruṇās tu sutā vāyor dāruṇāḥ saptasaptatiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.4.2c: prājāpatyā grahās tv aṣṭau gaṇakā nāmanāmataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.4.5c: ete nāmnā smṛtāḥ kaṅkās triṃśad dvau vāruṇā grahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.5.1c: kālaputrāḥ kabandhās te smṛtāḥ ṣaṇṇavatir grahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.5.2a: arciṣmāṃś ca prabhāsaś ca romaśo viṣamāṃs tathā |
GV06avpari_u:52.5.3a: ṛṣakaiś caiva rādhātaḥ kumudaḥ phanako ghanaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.5.3c: eṣām aśveti vijñeyā ārās tu parisarpakāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.5.5a: atisaṃtānakāś tv anye ṣaṣṭir vāyoḥ sutā grahāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.6.1a: miśrībhūtās tu te jñeyā guṇṭhitā iva reṇunā |
GV06avpari_u:52.6.1c: dhūmaketoḥ sutā jñeyāḥ śatam ekādhikaṃ ca tat ||
GV06avpari_u:52.6.3a: ye tu nakṣatravaṃśasya bhāgam uttaram āśritāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.6.4a: vyālakasya tu ye putrāḥ saptaṣaṣṭiḥ samantataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.6.5c: ekatārā dvitārā vā atha vā pañcatārakaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.7.1a: brahmarāśes tu te putrā grahāḥ saṃtānasaṃsthitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.7.2c: pañcaṣaṣṭis tu te jñeyāḥ prājāpatyā grahāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.7.3c: dṛśyante kārmukā nāma saptatyekā samāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.8.1c: daṇḍāś ca rāhuputrāḥ syur nāmabhis tulyavarcasaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.8.4a: pannagās tu caturviṃśat kṛṣṇā dvātriṃśatir grahāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.9.1c: uttarāparatas tv ekaḥ pītarakto grahaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.9.2c: yaḥ saṃdhivelāsv arkābho dikṣu sarvāsu dṛśyate ||
GV06avpari_u:52.9.3a: nātidūre raveḥ snigdhaḥ sa varṣāyābhayāya ca |
GV06avpari_u:52.9.4c: saptaite sthāvarā jñeyāḥ saha sūryeṇa sarpiṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.10.1c: dṛḍhavratas triśaṅkuś ca ajau vaiśvānare mṛḍaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.10.2a: aruṇaś ca danuś caiva yāmyāyāṃ sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.10.2c: gautamo 'trir vasiṣṭhaś ca viśvāmitras tu kaśyapaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.10.3a: ṛcīkaputraś ca tathā bharadvājaś ca vīryavān |
GV06avpari_u:52.10.3c: ete sapta mahātmāna udīcyāṃ sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.10.4c: pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ somo bhṛgur aṅgirasā saha ||
GV06avpari_u:52.10.5a: hāhāhūhū ca vijñeyau viṣṇoś ca padam uttamam |
GV06avpari_u:52.11.3a: hrasvāny asnehayuktāni na bhāvāya bhavanti hi |
GV06avpari_u:52.11.3c: yat kiṃcit sthāvaraṃ loke tat prasanneṣu vardhate ||
GV06avpari_u:52.11.4c: ādityaś caiva śukraś ca lohitāṅgas tathaiva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:52.11.5c: aindra āgneyo yāmyaś ca nairṛto vāruṇas tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:52.12.1a: vāyavyaś caiva saumyaś ca brāhmaś caivāṣṭamo grahaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.12.2a: yugagrahā na cānye te tatrāṣṭau diggrahāḥ smṛtāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.12.3c: mṛtyor niśvāsajāś cānye jñeyāḥ ṣoḍaśa ketavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.12.5c: dakṣayajñe tu rudrasya krodhād anye tu niḥsṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.13.1c: sapta paitāmahās tv anye tiryaggā jarjaragrahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.13.2c: śvetaketava ity anye vyākhyātā daśa pañca ca ||
GV06avpari_u:52.13.3c: te syuḥ śvetaśikhāḥ sarve saumyāḥ kāntās tanuprabhāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.14.1a: brahmakopamayas tv eko viśvātmā sarvato grahaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.14.2c: pūrvato 'bhyuditā vā syur nīcair uttaratas tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:52.14.3c: sarva eva tu vijñeyā grahā mandaphalodayāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.14.4c: sarve te sarvato hanyur aśubhaṃ yad vadanti ca ||
GV06avpari_u:52.15.1c: paśusasyopaghātaiś ca hanyur anyaiś ca kāraṇaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.15.2c: hanyuḥ pañcavidhaṃ sarve ketavo nātra saṃśayaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.15.3e: dāruṇeṣu ca ṛkṣeṣu vidyāt tatsadṛśaṃ phalam ||
GV06avpari_u:52.15.4c: sarva evoditā hanyuḥ sarva eva mahāgrahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.15.5a: mṛtyoḥ kālasya sūryasya brahmaṇas tryambakasya ca |
GV06avpari_u:52.15.5c: bhaumasya rāhor agneś ca prajātā ye sudāruṇāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.16.1a: prajāpateś ca dharmasya somasya varuṇasya ca |
GV06avpari_u:52.16.1c: pītādyāś ca diśāṃ putrā vijñeyā mṛdudāruṇāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.16.3a: śukrādīnāṃ ca ye putrā grahāṇāṃ parikīrtitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:52.16.3c: teṣāṃ vīryāṇi jāniyāt pitṛbhyaḥ sādhikāni tu ||
GV06avpari_u:52.16.4c: grahāṇāṃ saṃgraho hy evam eṣa kārtsnyena kīrtitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:52.16.7a: tat prayāti śamaṃ sarvaṃ prajānāṃ tu sukhaṃ bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:53.1.1a: om upetya yaś candramasaṃ raviṃ vā gṛhṇāti sūnor asurasya putraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.1.2a: yadā tu rāhuḥ śaśino raver <vā> [grahe] grahītukāmo bhavati prasahya |
GV06avpari_u:53.1.2c: tadā karoty adbhutadarśanāni yair jñāyate rāhur upaiṣyatīti ||
GV06avpari_u:53.1.3: udvepate tadā candro yadā rāhuḥ pradṛśyate || pāṇḍur vā jāyate klībaḥ śaśo vāsya vivardhate ||
GV06avpari_u:53.1.4c: vadanti ca bhaṛśaṃ śvāno vānti vātāś ca bhīṣaṇāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.1.5a: saṃdhyayor ubhayoś colkā gavāṃ prakṣīyate payaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.1.5c: kṣīriṇām aiva vṛkṣāṇāṃ tad ahar naśyate payaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.2.1c: ūrdhvaṃ vadati gomāyur yadā rāhuḥ pradṛśyate ||
GV06avpari_u:53.2.2c: ā paurṇamāsyā dṛśyeran sūryasya ca tathobhayoḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.2.3a: udito gṛhyamāṇas tu hanti vedavido janān |
GV06avpari_u:53.2.3c: bālāṃś ca jaṭilān hanti ye ca kāṣāyavāsasaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.2.4a: yauvanasthāṃś ca pūrvāhṇe hanti yajñavido janān |
GV06avpari_u:53.2.4c: audakāni ca sarvāṇi nāgendrāś cātra duḥkhitāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.2.5a: atha madhyapathaṃ prāptaḥ śūdrān hanti ca taskarān |
GV06avpari_u:53.3.1a: pralambaḥ pramadān hanti kṣatraṃ rāṣṭraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.3.1c: traigartāś cātra pīḍyante ye ca daṇḍabhṛto janāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.3.3a: śāradaṃ trīṇi varṣāṇi sasyaṃ jātaṃ na pacyate |
GV06avpari_u:53.3.4a: sarvaṃ saṃgrasate jyotiś ciram antardadhāti vā |
GV06avpari_u:53.3.4c: hanti sphītāni rāṣṭrāṇi pradhānaṃ ca mahīpatim ||
GV06avpari_u:53.3.5a: yadi <tu> rāhur ubhau śaśibhāskarau grasati pakṣam anantaram antataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.3.5c: puruṣaśoṇitakardamavāhinī bhavati bhūr na ca varṣati mādhavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.4.1a: gṛhītvā bhāskaraṃ pūrvaṃ gṛhṇāti śaśinaṃ yadi |
GV06avpari_u:53.4.1c: taṃ tu somottaraṃ nāśas tatra rdhyante hi devatāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.4.2a: vayasāṃ maraṇaṃ chidre prakīrṇe rakṣasāṃ vadhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.4.2c: nāgānāṃ tu mahānāge chidre devo na varṣati ||
GV06avpari_u:53.4.3a: śveto varṇo brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu lohitaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.4.3c: vaiśyānāṃ pītako varṇaḥ śūdrāṇāṃ kṛṣṇa ucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:53.4.4a: eteṣāṃ yena varṇena rāhuś carati bhāskare |
GV06avpari_u:53.4.4c: yā jātis tasya varṇasya tāṃ sa pīḍayate grahaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.4.5a: śyāmo bhavati vātāya draukṣo bhavati vṛṣṭaye |
GV06avpari_u:53.5.1a: tāmro bhavati śastrāya śastrāya rūkṣo bhavati mṛtyave |
GV06avpari_u:53.5.1c: bahvākāras tu bhūtānāṃ ghoraṃ janayate jvaram ||
GV06avpari_u:53.5.3c: amātyo hanti rājānaṃ rājā vāmātyam ātmaha ||
GV06avpari_u:53.5.4a: yasya rājñaś ca nakṣatre svarbhānur uparajyati |
GV06avpari_u:53.6.1c: kṣipraṃ vāpy uditaṃ brūhi sarvabhūtabhayāya vai ||
GV06avpari_u:53.6.2a: pradakṣiṇe tu somasya apasavye tu vigrahaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.6.2c: raśmibhede bhayaṃ ghoram ullekhe mantriṇāṃ vadhaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:53.6.3a: darśayitvā tu rūpāṇi yadā rāhur na dṛśyate |
GV06avpari_u:53.6.5a: candrasūryagrahe nādyād adyāt snātvā tu muktayoḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.6.6a: tataḥ ṣaṭsu tataḥ ṣaṭsu tato 'dhyardheṣū vā punaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.6.7a: tataḥ ṣaṭsu tataḥ ṣaṭsu triṣu varṣeṣu vā punaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:53.6.7c: etāvad eva rāhos tu cāram āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:54.1.1a: oṃ bhārgavas tu purovāca maharṣīn bhagavān ṛṣiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:54.1.2a: nimittani ca vakṣyāmitasyoktāni hi yāni tu |
GV06avpari_u:54.1.3a: viprāñ śvetākṛtir hanti kṣatriyān hanti lohitaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:54.1.3c: vaiśyāṃs tu pītako hanti śūdrān hanti tathāsitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:54.1.4a: itarān pīḍayet ketur anyavarṇo yadā bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:54.1.5a: śvetaḥ śastrākulaṃ kuryāl lohitas tv agnito bhayam.
GV06avpari_u:54.1.5c: kṣudbhayaṃ pītakaḥ kuryāt kṛṣṇo rogam atholbaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:54.2.1a: yasmin deśe śiras tasya sa deśaḥ pīḍyate bhṛśam |
GV06avpari_u:54.2.1c: madhye tu madhyamā pīḍā yato pucchaṃ tato jayaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:54.2.2c: dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sukhāyaiva hrasvaḥ sthūlo vināśakṛt ||
GV06avpari_u:54.2.3a: utthānaṃ caiva ketūnāṃ vināśāyaiva hi smṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:54.2.3c: tasmād ātharvaṇair mantraiḥ śamanam ārayed budhaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:54.2.4a: māhendrūn anṛtān raydrūn vauśvadevīm athāpi vā |
GV06avpari_u:54.2.5a: ārādhitāḥ śamaṃ yānti tadutpātā na saṃśayaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:54.2.5c: homair japyaiś ca vividhair dānaiś cabahurūpakaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:54.2.6a: tasya yatra śiro deśe tata utthāya vāvrajet |
GV06avpari_u:54.2.6c: dhanaṃ vā sarvam utsṛjya mṛtyor mucyetā vā na vā ||
GV06avpari_u:54.2.7a: dattvā vā pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ rājā śāntiṃ niyacchati ||
GV06avpari_u:55.1.1c: yāvanto yasya putrāḥ syuḥ kuryur yac coditā divi ||
GV06avpari_u:55.1.2a: sarve te dharaṇījātā māsā ye devanirmitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:55.1.3a: daśa vai vāruṇās tatra sūryaputrās tu viṃśatiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:55.1.4a: aṣṭādaśa ca kauberā vāyuputrās tu viṃśatiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:55.1.4c: eṣā saṃkhyā tu ketūnāṃ śatam ekottaraṃ smṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:55.1.6c: homair jāpaiś ca vividhair dānaiś ca bahurūpakaiḥ ||]
GV06avpari_u:55.1.7a: āvāhayet tato meghān pūrṇāṃ kuryād vasuṃdharām |
GV06avpari_u:55.1.8: dhānyaṃ samarghatāṃ yāti ītayo na bhavanti hi udaye vāruṇānāṃ tu etad bhavati lakṣaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:55.2.1c: teṣāṃ caiva tu karmāṇi lakṣaṇaiḥ śṛṇu yādṛśaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:55.2.2c: mriyante ca tathā gāvaḥ śvāpadāś ca viśeṣataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:55.2.3a: viṣaṃ ca prabalaṃ tatra sarvadamṣṭriṣu dāruṇam |
GV06avpari_u:55.3.1a: mārgaśīrṣe ca pauṣe ca agniputrān vinirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:55.3.1c: teṣāṃ caiva tu karmāṇi lakṣaṇaiḥ śṛṇu yādṛśaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:55.3.2: agnir dahati rāṣṭrāṇi haritāni vanāni ca vidravanti tato deśāḥ samantād bhayapīḍitāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:55.3.3a: kasmiṃś cij jāyate kṣemaṃ kasmiṃś cij jāyate bhayam |
GV06avpari_u:55.3.3c: udaye hy agniputrāṇām etad bhavati lakṣaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:55.4.1c: teṣāṃ caiva tu karmāṇi lakṣaṇaiḥ śṛṇu yādṛśaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:55.5.1c: teṣāṃ caiva tu karmāṇi lakṣaṇaiḥ śṛṇu yādṛśaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:55.5.3c: evaṃ prajñās tu manyante kubere graham āgate ||
GV06avpari_u:55.5.4: udaye tu kuberāṇām etad bhavati lakṣaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:55.6.1c: teṣāṃ caiva tu karmāṇi lakṣaṇaiḥ śṛṇu yādṛśaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:55.6.3a: gṛhāṇi rāmaṇīyāni kṣayaṃ yānti jalāni ca |
GV06avpari_u:55.6.4c: jānāti yaḥ phalaṃ ca protkṛṣṭāḥ saṃpadas tasya ||
GV06avpari_u:56.1.1c: śeṣān ṛkṣavibhāge tu trikaṃ prati vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:56.1.2: sāketamithile mekalālayāv ahichattranāgapuraṃ kāśipāriyātrakurupāñcālāḥ || atha kosalakauśāmbītīraṃ pāṭaliputraṃ kaliṅgapurapṛthivīmaṇḍalamadhye 'bhihate 'bhihanyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:56.1.5: āvantyakā vidarbhā matsyā cakorabhīma[gam]rathā yavanavalayakāntīsiṃhalalaṅkuṇanāsikyakarmaṇoyāmimahi^narmadabhṛgukacchā dakṣiṇapaścād dhate 'bhihanyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:56.1.9: brahmāvartaṃ śatadruhimavantaṃ parvataṃ ca mainākaṃ kāśmīraṃ caiva tathā uttarapārśve hate 'bhihanyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:56.1.10a: nepālakāmarūpaṃ ca videhodumbaraṃ tathā || tathāvantyaḥ kaikayaś ca uttarapūrve hate 'bhihanyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:57.1.1a: viśākhe kṛttikāḥ puṣyaḥ pūrvau proṣṭhapadau tathā |
GV06avpari_u:57.1.1c: bharaṇyaś ca maghāś caiva phalgunyau prathame tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:57.1.2a: yady atra calate bhūmir nirghātolkāsta eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:57.1.2c: aśarīrāś ca nardante kampante daivatāni ca ||
GV06avpari_u:57.1.3a: ādityo vātra gṛhyeta somo vāpy uparajyate |
GV06avpari_u:57.1.3c: āgneyaṃ tad vijānīyād durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:57.1.4a: alpakṣīrās tathā gāvo agner vyādhiś ca jāyate |
GV06avpari_u:57.1.4c: purāṇi deśā grāmāś ca pīḍyante hy agninā tadā ||
GV06avpari_u:57.1.5a: pīḍyante cāgnikarmāṇo agniveśāś ca ye narāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:57.1.5c: pittajvaras tathā śvāsaha prajāḥ pīḍayate tadā ||
GV06avpari_u:57.1.6c: āpagāś cātra śuṣyanti na ca sasyavatī mahī ||
GV06avpari_u:57.1.7a: tapyate ca tadā bhūmir na ca devo 'bhivarṣati |
GV06avpari_u:57.1.8c: etai rūpais tu vijñeyam āgneyaṃ caladarśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:57.2.1c: brāhmaṃ mṛgaśiraḥ svātir vāyavyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ smṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:57.2.2a: yady atra calate bhūmir nirghātolkāsta eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:57.2.2c: aśarīrāś ca nardante kampante daivatāni ca ||
GV06avpari_u:57.2.3a: ādityo vātra gṛhyeta somo vāpy uparajyate |
GV06avpari_u:57.2.3c: vāyavyaṃ tad vijānīyād akṣemaṃ cātra nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:57.2.4a: pāṃsuvarṣaṃ tadā ghoraṃ kṣīre sarpir na vidyate |
GV06avpari_u:57.2.5c: gandhārāś ca vinaśyanti etaiḥ sārdhaṃ tathā kila ||
GV06avpari_u:57.2.6a: gajā vājina uṣṭrāś ca vṛkā nakulaceṭakāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:57.2.6c: pīḍyante vyādhinā sarve ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:57.2.8c: etai rūpais tu vijñeyaṃ vāyavyaṃ caladarśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:57.3.1a: ārdrāśleṣās tathā mūlan pūrvāṣāḍhās tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:57.3.1c: vāruṇaṃ revatī caiva sūryadaivatyam eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:57.3.2a: yady atra calate bhūmir nirghātolkāsta eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:57.3.2c: aśarīrāś ca nardante kampante daivatāni ca ||
GV06avpari_u:57.3.3a: ādityo vātra gṛhyeta somo vāpy uparajyate |
GV06avpari_u:57.3.3c: vāruṇaṃ tad vijānīyāt subhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:57.3.4a: bahukṣīrās tathā gāvo nāgāś ca phalinas tathā |
GV06avpari_u:57.3.4c: śāntārayaḥ prajāḥ sarvā gomino jaṅgalaṃ payaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:57.3.6a: nyastaśastrāś ca rājāno brahmakṣatraṃ ca vardhate |
GV06avpari_u:57.3.6c: etai rūpais tu vijñeyaṃ vāruṇaṃ caladarśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:57.4.1c: prājāpatyam āṣāḍhāś ca māhendraṃ maṇḍalaṃ smṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:57.4.2a: yady atra calate bhūmir nirghātolkāsta eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:57.4.2c: aśarīrāś ca nardante kampante daivatāni ca ||
GV06avpari_u:57.4.3a: ādityo vātra gṛhyeta somo vāpy uparajyate |
GV06avpari_u:57.4.3c: māhendraṃ tad vijānīyāt sukṣemaṃ cātra nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:57.4.4c: kīṭā vyālā mriyante ca ye cānye svedajantavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:57.4.6a: viṃśatiśataṃ tv āgneyaṃ vāyavyaṃ navatiṃ calet |
GV06avpari_u:57.4.6c: aśītiṃ calate tv aindraṃ vāruṇaṃ saptatiṃ calet ||
GV06avpari_u:57.4.7a: āgneyo bhūmikampo yaḥ sa dvimāsād vipacyate |
GV06avpari_u:57.4.7c: vāruṇas tu phalaṃ sadyo vāyavyas tu trimāsikaḥ || māhendrasya phalaṃ vidyān māsam ardhaṃ tathaiva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:58.1.1a: om ata ūrdhvaṃ ca digdāhān kīrtyamānān nibodhata |
GV06avpari_u:58.1.1c: yathā diśaḥ pradahyante tāsāṃ dāhaphalaṃ ca yat ||
GV06avpari_u:58.1.2a: indro 'gnir marutaś caiva pradahanti diśo daśa |
GV06avpari_u:58.1.3: yadāstamita āditye vahner jvālā pradṛśyate. diśāṃ dāhaṃ tu tad vidyād bhārgavasya vaco yathā ||
GV06avpari_u:58.1.5a: diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradahyante akṣemāya phalāya ca |
GV06avpari_u:58.1.5c: avadāhād ṛte dāhaṃ yadi snigdhāḥ pradarśanāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:58.1.7c: rūkṣāḥ kṛṣṇātha māñjiṣṭhā bandhujīvakavac ca ye ||
GV06avpari_u:58.1.8a: śvetā raktāś ca pītāś ca dāhāḥ kṛṣṇāś ca varṇataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:58.1.11a: ṛtau tu varṣaṃ tīvraṃ syāt sainyavidravam eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:58.1.11c: bhṛśam uddyotanī saṃdhyā kurute vā grahāgamam ||
GV06avpari_u:58.1.13c: sarvaṃ digdāhajaṃ ghoraṃ śamayet sā sadakṣiṇā ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.1.1a: om ulkādayo hi nirdiṣṭā nirghātās tu purātra ye |
GV06avpari_u:58b.1.1c: teṣām idānīṃ vakṣyāmi viśeṣāṃs tu pṛthakpṛthak ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.1.2c: tad ulkālakṣaṇaṃ śrīmad aṅgaṃ kārtsnyena vakṣyate ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.1.4a: tāny etāni prakāśante bhābhir vitimiraṃ nabhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:58b.1.6: kṣitau salakṣaṇāny eva nipatantīha bhārgava teṣāṃ nipatatāṃ tatra yatrayatropalakṣyate tatratatraiva vividhaṃ prajānāṃ jāyate bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.1.8a: tārā dhiṣṇyās tatholkāś ca vidyuto 'śanayas tathā |
GV06avpari_u:58b.2.3c: prakṛtyā pauruṣī tūlkā tasyā bhedān nibodhata ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.2.4a: kṛśā nārīva dīptā syāc chikhā sāṅgāravarṣiṇī |
GV06avpari_u:58b.2.6c: kāś cid indrāyudhaprakhyāḥ kāś cin maṇḍalasaṃsthitāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.2.7a: chattravac cāpu dṛśyante cakravan nipatanti ca |
GV06avpari_u:58b.2.7c: daṇḍavac cāpi tiṣṭhanti pradhāvanti ca sarpavat ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.2.8c: abhyucchritena pucchena yāti kā cid dharātalam ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.2.9: tejāṃsi vikiranty anyāḥ pradhāvanti ca golavat ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.3.3a: patantī dṛśyate kā cit kā cid bhramati cāmbare |
GV06avpari_u:58b.3.3c: ulkāsaṃghaiḥ parivṛtā kā cid yāti dharātalam ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.3.4: sāmānyaṃ tu phalaṃ tāsāṃ tat samāsena vakṣyate | varāhapretaśārdūlasiṃhamārjāravārāiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.3.5: tulyā bhayāvahā ulkā nikṛṣṭāhinibhā ca yā | śūlapaṭṭiśaśaktyṛṣṭimudgarāsiparaśvadhaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.3.6a: vṛṣṭyākāreṇa tulyāś ca vṛkṣābhāś ca vigarhitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:58b.3.9c: yas tu śuklena varṇena vapuṣā pelavena vā ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.3.11a: evaṃ pañcavidhā hy etāḥ śaunakena prakīrtitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.3c: dvāre cāyuḥkṣayaṃ vidyād gṛhe tu svāmino bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.4a: goṣṭheṣu gomināṃ vidyāt karṣakāṇāṃ khaleṣu ca |
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.4c: gṛheṣu rājñāṃ jānīyād bheṣu tadbhaktināṃ bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.9c: golavac ca pradhāvanti tāsu rāṣṭrabhayaṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.13c: nabho madhyaṃ ca yā yānti yāś ca kuryur gatāgatam ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.16c: kṣitāv aśanayo yatra tatra nāsti bhayāgamaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.17c: bhavanti vidyuto neṣṭā iṣṭāś ca syur ato 'nyathā ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.18a: tārā dhiṣṇyāś ca boddhavyāś cirān mṛduphalodayāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.18c: tāsām api ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ patanaṃ doṣakārakam ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.19c: tatastato nṛpo yāyād daivo mārgaḥ sa ucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:58b.4.20c: kṛtvā siddhim avāpnoti ulkādoṣāc ca mucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:59.1.2a: caturthīṃ pañcamīṃ caiva pratīkṣeta sadā śuciḥ |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.4a: aindryāṃ cet syandate vidyud aindrasthaś cāpi mārutaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.4c: subhikṣaṃ kṣemam ārogyaṃ nirītiṃ ca vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:59.1.5a: āgneyyāṃ ced ubhau syātāṃ bhayaṃ śastrāgnivṛṣṭihtaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.6a: kanīyasī tu nairṛtyāṃ tathā bahvītikā samā |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.10a: saṃpadyate mahāsasyān mahāṃś cet syād avagrahaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.10c: aśubhā syandate pūrvaṃ yadi paścāc ca śobhanā ||
GV06avpari_u:59.1.11a: suvṛṣṭim eva tatrāhur na ca sasyaṃ samṛdhyati |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.11c: yadā tu sarvāḥ syandante viṣamāṃ vṛṣṭim ādiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:59.1.13a: pūrvottarāṃ diśaṃ meghāḥ suvṛṣṭiṃ tāṃ vijānate |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.14c: āgneyeṣv ativṛṣṭiḥ syāt sasyaṃ cāpi vipadyate ||
GV06avpari_u:59.1.15a: viṣamā vṛṣṭir yāmyeṣu vyādhiṃ mṛtyuṃ ca nirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.16c: vāyavyāṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ yatra varṣati vāsavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:59.1.18: saumyāṃ yatra pravarṣeyus tatra sarvavṛṣṭyāṃ payodharāḥ
GV06avpari_u:59.1.19a: ity etat pūrvavarṣeṣu lakṣaṇaṃ vidyutāṃ sphuṭam |
GV06avpari_u:59.1.20c: aśubheṣu samarghāya tasmāt sarveṣu śāntikam iti ||
GV06avpari_u:60.1.1a: aṣṭau bhavanti nirghātās teṣām indraḥ praśasyate |
GV06avpari_u:60.1.1c: pūrveṇa vṛṣṭiṃ sasyaṃ ca rājavṛddhiṃ ca nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:60.1.3a: paścimāyāṃ bhayaṃ rājño jalajātiś ca pīḍyate |
GV06avpari_u:60.1.3c: nairṛte sasyagostrīṇāṃ gaṇānāṃ ca mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:60.1.4a: dakṣiṇe rājapīḍā syād āyuś cātra vinirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:60.1.4c: ānartasya bhayaṃ vidyād yadi syāt pūrvadakṣiṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:60.1.5c: sarvatra ca bhayaṃ vidyāt tatra yatra viśāmyati ||
GV06avpari_u:60.1.6c: tayā śāmyanti cotpātāḥ sukhaṃ cātyantikaṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.1a: om athātaḥ pariveṣāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva vakṣyate |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.1c: vṛddhagargo yathā pūrvam uvāca mama suvrata ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.3a: śvetaḥ śyāmo hariḥ kṛṣṇa iti varṇā vyavasthitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.3c: proktā megheṣu catvāro vyaktāḥ snigdhāḥ supūjitāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.4c: saṃdhyāyām atra varṇeṣu vṛṣṭiṃ teṣv abhinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.6a: nimagnā tu yadā saṃdhyā bhavaty etat suvṛṣṭaye |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.6c: ebhyaś ca viparītā ye te 'vṛṣṭibhayadā ghanāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.7a: varāhair makarair uṣṭrair vṛkaiḥ kaṅkais tathā kharaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.9c: aśvasthā vāraṇasthāś ca yeṣu yodhā narā iva ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.12c: saṃdhyāsv abhrāṇi dṛśyante tīvraṃ varṣam upasthitam ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.13c: saṃdhyāsv abhrāṇi dṛśyante tīvraṃ varṣam upasthitam ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.15a: trivarṇe parighe vāpi trivarṇair vā balāhakaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.15c: udayāstamayam iyād yadi sūryaḥ kadā cana ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.16c: lokakṣayakaraṃ vidyād yadi devo na varṣati ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.18a: etad dṛṣṭvā mahad rūpam āditye samupasthite |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.20c: utpadyante trayo bhāvās tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.21c: tāṃ diśaṃ yojayet snenāṃ garjanaṃ yatra mīyate ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.23c: tāṃ diśaṃ yojayet senāṃ rājā jayati tāṃ diśam ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.24c: evam eva vidhir jñeyaḥ sarvaś caiva viniścayaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:61.1.25a: parimāṇaṃ na śakyaṃ tat samīritum aśeṣataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.26a: saṃdhyā yojanabhāk proktā stanitaṃ tu dviyojanam |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.27a: nirghātaḥ ṣaṭ tathā vidyut pariveṣo dviṣaḍyataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:61.1.27c: dāhaṃ yojanakaṃ cāpi ulkā tv amitabhāginī ||
GV06avpari_u:62.1.1a: oṃ catvāro bhumikampās tu gargaḥ provāca buddhimān |
GV06avpari_u:62.1.1c: agnir vāyus tathāpaś ca caturthas tv indra ucyate ||
GV06avpari_u:62.1.2c: yaj jñātvā buddhimān dhīro nirdiśed vividhaṃ phalam ||
GV06avpari_u:62.1.4: rājñāṃ virodho bhavati maraṇāni bhavanti ca |] tāmraḥ sūryaś ca candraś ca pītāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:62.1.6a: tasmin bhavati nirdeśaḥ śaunakasya vaco yathā |
GV06avpari_u:62.1.6c: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca yac cānyad vidyate gṛhe ||
GV06avpari_u:62.1.7c: rāṣṭrāṇi saṃdahed agnir grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca
GV06avpari_u:62.1.8c: rājānaś ca virudhyante devaś cātra na varṣati ||
GV06avpari_u:62.2.2c: śarkarākarṣaṇaś cāpi dikṣu caiva vidikṣu ca ||
GV06avpari_u:62.2.4a: na tadā pravased grāmaṃ jñātvātmānaṃ tu gopayet |
GV06avpari_u:62.2.5a: virudhyante ca rājāno maraṇāni bhavanti hi |
GV06avpari_u:62.2.6a: māsaṃ viṃśatirātraṃ vā devas tatra na varṣati |
GV06avpari_u:62.2.6c: dvābhyāṃ gatābhyāṃ māsābhyāṃ paraṃ syād bahulaṃ jalam ||
GV06avpari_u:62.2.7c: eṣām eva tu kampānāṃ garhitaṃ vāyukampitam ||
GV06avpari_u:62.3.2c: nakrāś ca śiśumārāś ca kūrmā makarasaṃsthitāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:62.3.4a: parvateṣu vaped bījam ūṣare jāṅgale tathā |
GV06avpari_u:62.3.4c: tatroptaṃ nandate bījam anyatra bhuvi naśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:62.3.5a: udajāni tu puṣpāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca |
GV06avpari_u:62.3.5c: gacchanti tatra vṛddhiṃ ca sattvāny udakajāni ca ||
GV06avpari_u:62.4.2a: gambhīraṃ garjamānas tu megha āyāti pārthivaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:62.4.3a: vitrāsayan diśaḥ sarvā drutaṃ cāpi pravarṣati |
GV06avpari_u:62.4.3c: indrāyudhaṃ bhavec cātra vidyut stanitam eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:62.4.4a: suvṛṣṭiṃ kṣemam ārogyaṃ subhikṣaṃ paramā mudaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:62.4.4c: yajñodbhavais tu modante ānandair moditāḥ prajāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:62.4.5c: jānīyāl lakṣaṇair etaiḥ sarvam eva śubhāśubham ||
GV06avpari_u:62.4.6c: māhendrīm amṛtāṃ vāpi kuryāc chāntiṃ sadakṣiṇām ||
GV06avpari_u:62.4.7a: indrakampe tu vidhivad aindrair mantrair vidhānavit |
GV06avpari_u:62.4.7c: tatohalasya pradhānārthaṃ juhuyāc ca japet tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:63.1.1a: om atha paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vakṣatreṣu graheṣu ca |
GV06avpari_u:63.1.3a: prājāpatyāṃś ca raudrāṃś ca nairṛtyāṃś cāpi bhārgava |
GV06avpari_u:63.1.6c: tasya rūpaṃ guṇaṃ jñātvā guṇadoṣaḥ pracakṣyate ||
