GV06avpari_u:67.4.5a: agnir hiraṇyapatis ca arciṣpāṇis tathā īśvaras |
GV06avpari_u:67.5.1a: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vajraṃ vaiḍūryaṃ mauktikāni ca |
GV06avpari_u:67.5.2a: ārambhās ca vipadyante na soddhis karmaṇām api |
GV06avpari_u:67.5.2c: carur vaiśravaṇas tatra abhi tyaṃ devam ṛk smṛtā ||
GV06avpari_u:67.6.1a: atha yasya svanakṣatre ulkā nirghāta eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:67.6.1c: rāhur grasati candrārkau kabandhaṃ darpaṇe bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:67.6.2a: patet svayaṃ vā musalaṃ devatā vā kathaṃ cana |
GV06avpari_u:67.6.2c: unmīlate ca eva yadā tathā ca api nimīlate ||
GV06avpari_u:67.6.3a: prachidyate ca yadi vā tathā vā api prakampate |
GV06avpari_u:67.6.3c: prayāto vā api dṛśyeta pratisroto nadī vahet ||
GV06avpari_u:67.6.4a: vimale na eva arkachāyā pratīpā vā api tu sāyakās |
GV06avpari_u:67.6.5a: kośāt khaḍgā nirgirante tūṇāt ca eva tu sāyakās |
GV06avpari_u:67.6.6a: caruṇā vaiṣṇavena eṣāṃ yāgas kartavyas eva tu |
GV06avpari_u:67.6.6c: idaṃ viṣṇus pradhānaṃ syāt pañcājyāhutayas tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:67.7.1a: ativāto yatra bhavet rūpaṃ vā yatra vaikṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:67.7.2a: gṛdhrās ca tathā gomāyus kṛkalāsā vadanti ca |
GV06avpari_u:67.7.2c: māṃsapeśaṃ ca rudhiraṃ pāṃsuvṛṣṭis tathā eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:67.7.3c: vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ vāyau ā yāhi darśata iti sthālīpākasya homayet ||
GV06avpari_u:67.7.4a: vāyur mahān nabhapatir vajrapāṇis tathā īśvaras |
GV06avpari_u:67.7.5a: hutvā sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca eva carutantraṃ samāpayet |
GV06avpari_u:67.7.5c: vimuktotpātadoṣas tu jīvet tu śaradas śatam ||
GV06avpari_u:67.8.1a: atha ced anyaśākhasu kartā bhavati vedavit |
GV06avpari_u:67.8.2c: vācayet tam upādhyāyaṃ vastreṇa kanakena vā ||
GV06avpari_u:67.8.3a: dṛṣṭāṃ ca eva adbhutaṃ yasmins tat ca api pratipādayet |
GV06avpari_u:67.8.3c: etās tu dakṣiṇās sarvās śaktiyukto na hāpayet ||
GV06avpari_u:67.8.4a: yajamānas tatsuto vā yas svayaṃ kartum arhati |
GV06avpari_u:67.8.4c: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa dadyāt tāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śubhām ||
GV06avpari_u:67.8.5a: japtvā atharvaśiras ca eva kuryāt vipreṣu pūjanam |
GV06avpari_u:67.8.5c: śaktyā atha bhojanaṃ ca eva kuryāt vipreṣu pūjanam ||
GV06avpari_u:67.8.6c: caturṇām api varṇānāṃ yas kuryāt śraddhayā anvitas ||
GV06avpari_u:67.8.7a: maraṇaṃ na bhavet tasya na duḥkhaṃ na daridratā |
GV06avpari_u:67.8.7c: sidhyanti sarvakāryāṇi dharme ca asya matir bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:67.8.8c: sarvaśāntikaṃ ca eva pratipuruṣaṃ nibodhata || pratipuruṣaṃ nibodhata iti ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.1a: om athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi yad uktaṃ padmayoninā |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.2c: śaśaṃsire purā yaṃ hi śaunakāya mahātmane ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.5a: teṣāṃ tathā phalaṃ vidyāt saṃnipāte yathākramam |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.6a: eṣāṃ prakṛtitulyānāṃ niṣiktānāṃ tu teṣu vai |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.6c: saṃyogeṣu ca jātānāṃ tulya prakṛtitā bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.10c: lālanāḥ śithilāṅgāś ca priyāś ca priyāś ca lavaṇās tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.11a: tanutvaṅnakharomāṇas tv ācāryās tīkṣṇa eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.15a: viśuṣkāṇi ca vastrāṇi rudhirāṅgāṃs tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.15c: dahanādīṃś ca devāṃś ca raktam induṃ sugandhikān ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.18a: uṣṇārtāḥ śītakāmās tu nimajjanti pibanti ca |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.18c: kalahaṃ caiva kurvanti duḥkhāny anubhavanti ca ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.19a: strībhiś caiva vimānyante kṣayante klāmayanti ca |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.20: prakṛtisvapnabhāvaiś ca śleṣmikāṇy api me śṛṇu | snigdhakeśanakhaśmaśrutatatvagroma[bhāṣiṇaḥ] ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.23c: cirād gṛhṇanti suciraṃ gṛhītaṃ dhārayanti ca ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.24a: na krudhyanti cirāt kruddhāḥ saṃbhavanty antakopamāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.24c: pūjābhir vipulāṃ bhūmim āvahanti kulasya ca ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.25a: khyāpayanti ca sarvatra guṇaiś ca vipulair yaśaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.32c: spaṣṭatāraṃ tu haṃsāś ca vyopoḍhanti nabhastalam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.34c: śubhrāṇi ca vimānāni phalāni madhurāṇi ca ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.42a: kṣāmā bhinnāḥ sadoṣāś ca satataṃ vānavasthitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.43a: akasmāt kopanāś cāpi rodanā dhamānās tathā |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.47c: bhramanti ghnanti dhāvanti ūrdhvebhyaḥ prapatanti ca ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.49: etās tisraḥ prakṛtayaḥ saṃsṛṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.50a: samyak karaṇavijñānaṃ tathā svapnād bhavet phalam |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.50c: śubhaṃ vāpi aśubhaṃ vāpi nirdeṣṭavyam aśeṣataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.52c: svapnamālāṃ tu yaḥ paśyed yāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā na tu smaret ||
GV06avpari_u:68.1.53a: naite phalaṃ prayacchanti gargasya vacanaṃ yathā |
GV06avpari_u:68.1.54c: dṛṣṭvā bhogam asuptavyaṃ tataḥ prāpya śubhaṃ phalam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.1c: samudraṃ vāhinīṃ dvīpaṃ laṅghayed vā vasuṃdharām ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.3c: sarpiṣā pāyasaṃ bhuṅkte gāṃ duhan yaś ca budhyati ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.5a: ā kaṇṭhaṃ majjate yo hi mānavaḥ śoṇitārṇave |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.6a: mahīṃ vā kampayed yas tu cālayed vā punar girīm |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.6c: śvetam aśvam athāruhya pāṇḍuraṃ vāpu yo gajam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.7c: aṅgavṛddhiṃ śirovṛddhiṃ prāpnuyād yas tu mānavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.8a: brāhmaṇo vāpi rājā vā svapne yad abhiṣecayet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.8c: rājā tu pārthivo jñeyaḥ kroṣṭuker vacanaṃ yathā ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.9a: śiro vā chidyate yasya vimānaṃ śoṇitaṃ tathā |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.9c: senāpatyaṃ mahac cāyur arthalābhaṃ tathaiva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.10a: vibhūṣaṇaṃ ca vidyāṃ ca karṇachedam avāpnuyāt |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.11a: uraḥ sahasralābhaḥ syāt pādachede tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.13c: vimalānāṃ jalānāṃ ca pūrvoktaṃ tu nidarśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.18a: ghātanaṃ śvāpadānāṃ ca pāṇau ca rudhirāgamaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.19a: labhate nātra saṃdeho bhārgavasya vaco tathā |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.19c: śuklāḥ sumanasaḥ kanyā dadhi gobrāhmaṇaṃ vṛṣam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.20c: suhṛdaḥ saphalā vṛkṣā nakṣatrāṇy amalaṃ jalam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.22a: dṛṣṭvā yas tatkṣaṇaṃ budhyet tasya kalyāṇam ādiśet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.22c: vṛkṣān gulmāṃś ca vallīś ca svagṛhe puṣpitā naraḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.23a: śuklavāsāḥ striyaś cāpi yaḥ paśyec chrīs tu taṃ bhajet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.24a: dīptāṅgo labhate bhūmiṃ vardhamānāṅga eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.25a: śokārto labhate tuṣṭiṃ mṛtaś cāyur avāpnuyāt |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.26a: yaḥ svapne saṃbhayed ugraṃ pārakyaṃ so 'rtham āpnuyāt |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.27a: kāñcanaṃ paśyate yas tu tathā strīṃ labhate naraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.28a: mattaṃ kareṇum āruhya parastrīṃ labhate naraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.28c: kumārīṃ labhate nārīm āyasair nigaḍair naraḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.29a: baddhvā navāṃ tu yo mālām utpālānāṃ vibudhyate |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.30a: bhṛṅgāro darpaṇo vāpi labdhvā putrāgamaṃ vadet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.31c: cipiṭaḥ kālako nagnaḥ śravaṇo mehate yadi ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.32a: vidikthaḥ sravate cārmiḥ svapne varṣaṃ samādiśet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.32c: sūkarīṃ mahiṣīṃ vāpi hastinīṃ śakunīṃ tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.33a: svapne yadā prasūyeta subhikṣaṃ nirdiśet tadā |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.34a: yeṣāṃ svapne pralīyante teṣāṃ vṛddhim athādiśet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.34c: govṛṣaṃ puruṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ hastinaṃ parvataṃ gṛham ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.35c: daivatāni dvijā gāvaḥ pitaro liṅgino grahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.36a: yad vadanti naraṃ svapne tat tathaiva vinirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.37a: narasya śoṇitaṃ pītvā prakṛtāṇl labhate naraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.39a: kṛmiṇatvaṃ bhaved dhanyaṃ kroṣṭuker vacanaṃ yathā |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.40c: yadyad ujjvalavad dravyaṃ tattat sukhakaraṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.41a: yadyad virudhyate vāpi svapne tat tasya nirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.42c: hasadbhir vā parivṛto nṛtyadbhiḥ svajanair api ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.43c: ratham āruhya yo yāyād akṣatas tu yugaṃdharaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.45a: nīyate puruṣair yaś ca pāśahastair viśeṣataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.46a: piṇyākasya tilānāṃ ca karṣāsu lavaṇasya ca |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.50a: prasanne tu dhruvaṃ śoko rajjuchede mriyeta saḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.50c: rūḍhasya srotasā śoko mṛtyuḥ sriotasi naśyataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.51c: bhrātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāpi putraṃ vā nāśayanti te ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.52a: dvāre vā sārgale vāpi śayyāṃ śakhāṃ tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.52c: svapne yasya pranaśyanti bhāryā tasya vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.53a: kṛkalāso vṛko vāpi puruṣo vāpi piṅgalaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.54c: kṛṣṇasya vā śiraś chindyāt putras tasya vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.55a: rājaputraś ca coraś ca rājabhṛṭyaś ca yo bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.55c: tasya svapnāḥ phalaṃ dadyur eteṣu yad udāhṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.56a: yeṣāṃ lābhe bhaved vṛddhis teṣāṃ nāśe guṇo bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.56c: yeṣāṃ lābhe bhaved dhānis teṣāṃ lābhe guṇo bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.57a: śubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu yaḥ svapne punaḥ paśyaty apūjitam |
GV06avpari_u:68.2.57c: śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vāpi yat paścāt tatphalaṃ labhet ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.59: māsiko govisarge tu sadyaḥpākaḥ prabhātike. kālaḥ pañcasv avasthāsu śarvaryāḥ kīrtitaḥ pṛthak ||
GV06avpari_u:68.2.61c: śāntikriyā svastyayanakriyā ca duḥsvapnam etāni vināśayanti ||
GV06avpari_u:68.3.1a: imān dṛṣṭvāśubhān svapnān prātar utthāya satvaraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.3.3a: yo na jīvaḥ paro 'pehi vidma te svapna vedanam |
GV06avpari_u:68.3.3c: rocanā sarṣapā mṛdā samit sakusumaṃ dadhi ||
GV06avpari_u:68.3.4a: gām ajaṃ kanakaṃ sattvaṃ kumārīṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śubham |
GV06avpari_u:68.3.4c: abhivandya nṛpo yāyāt suhṛdāṃś ca manoharān ||
GV06avpari_u:68.3.5a: yadā tu yātrāṃ nṛpatiḥ kartum icched vidhānavit |
GV06avpari_u:68.3.6c: tāṃ niśaṃ saṃviśed rājā bhūmau caivābhimantrayet ||
GV06avpari_u:68.3.7c: evam uktvā narapatiḥ prayatātmā tataḥ svapet ||
GV06avpari_u:68.3.9a: māhendrīm amṛtāṃ raudrīṃ kuryād vāpy aparājitām |
GV06avpari_u:68.3.9c: kauberīṃ vā prayuñjīta ādityāṃ vā sadakṣiṇām ||
GV06avpari_u:68.3.10a: rajanikaradivākarau karābhyāṃ spṛśati yadā grasate 'tha vā narendraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.3.10c: lavaṇajalanidhiṃ nadīṃ ca dorbhyāṃ tarati hradāpadakardamaṃ tamo vā ||
GV06avpari_u:68.3.11a: naraturagamahīruhān nagān vā bhavanacarān na virohayed gajān vā |
GV06avpari_u:68.3.11c: jvalanamaraṇakālavṛddhayogān yadi nṛpa ātmagatāṃś ca paśyatīha
GV06avpari_u:68.3.12: yadi ca nṛpatir ātmano 'bhracārair bhramati mahīṃ sapurāṃ parikṣipet yadi ca sa ciramagnagātramātro bhramati nṛpo grasate 'tha medinīṃ vā ||
GV06avpari_u:68.3.13a: yadi ca jayati damṣṭriṇo narān vā yadi ca bhavet sitamālyadānadhārī |
GV06avpari_u:68.3.13c: yadi ca ruditi caivam ādi dṛṣṭvā paraviṣayaṃ hṛṣitas tatas tu yāyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:68.4.1c: malinavasanajīrṇaraktavāsā yadi sumanobhir alaṃkṛtaḥ svayaṃ vā ||
GV06avpari_u:68.4.2a: svapiti jayati khādati prahṛṣṭo vilapati nartati gāyanaprahāsaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.4.2c: bhavati ca mudito labheta kanyāṃ yadi nṛpatir nayaśo bhavej jayārthī ||
GV06avpari_u:68.4.3c: vinihataturagadvipo narendro yadi patitadhvajavāṃs tato na yāyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:68.4.4a: narapatir aparājitaḥ parair yo yadi ca paraiḥ parihasyate madadbhiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.4.4c: yadi ca bhavati durdṛśograrūpo <atha> na sa īdṛśakaḥ parān prayāyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:68.4.5a: svapnān dṛṣṭvā śubhān rājā japadbhir abhimantritaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.1c: mātaraṃ praviśed yaś ca jvalitaṃ ca hutāśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.2a: prāsadāt parvatāgrād vā pated yaś cāpi mānavaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.2c: magnaḥ kardamakūpeṣu jale yaś cāpi naśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.3a: drumam unmūlayed yas tu paśyed rājñopasevakam |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.4c: vivarṇo vāpi pāśair yo badhyate mriyate tu saḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.5a: kāṃsyaṃ vā kāṃsyapātrīṃ vā yasya tejo 'dhirohati |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.8a: śvā vā ajagaro godhā tarakṣu śalyako 'pi vā |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.9c: svapne yam upatiṣṭhanti vyādhis tam upatiṣṭhati ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.13c: ānandaś ca pramodaś ca vyasanasya ca darśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.15a: ulkābhedās tathā pañca pariveṣā nava smṛtāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.16c: viṃśatī dve ca vijñeyā bhedā hy ulkādiṣu smṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.20c: satataṃ cānulipyas tu puṣpair dhūpair yathoditaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.22c: tasminn evāntare śānte goṣṭhe vā jalasaṃnidhau ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.23a: nirgatya nagarād vāpi śucau deśe samāhitaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.24c: aṅgāni kuryur anye ca śatasaṃkhyā dvijottamāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.25c: te sadasyā iti proktā vācane yajñakarmaṇi ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.26c: sarvakarmasu vettā ya ānayet so 'py athādarāt ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.27a: bhūmiṃ saṃśodhya vidhivat kṛtvā tatra ca maṇḍapam |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.27c: vidhivat kalpayed vediṃ yajñapātrāṇi ca svayam ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.29a: annair vastraiś ca vividhaiḥ saṃyuktāṃ bahudakṣiṇām |
GV06avpari_u:68.5.29c: kārayitvā mahāśāntiṃ varaṃ gāṃ ca nivedayet ||
GV06avpari_u:68.5.31a: mahat sukham avāpnoti kāryasiddhiṃ ca vindati |
GV06avpari_u:69.1.2a: kāmā hi bahavo loke saṃsthitā bhinnasādhanāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:69.1.2c: ekam eva paraṃ teṣāṃ samyak tvaṃ brūhy asaṃśayam ||
GV06avpari_u:69.1.5c: duḥsādhyāni nimittāni tāni vedmi hi kāni cit ||
GV06avpari_u:69.2.1a: akāle yasya jāyante dantāḥ keśair vivarjitaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:69.2.2a: dvidantaś cāpi jāyeta tasya karma svaśākhikam |
GV06avpari_u:69.2.2c: svaśākhāyāṃ tu yat proktaṃ kuryād vātharvaṇaṃ vidhim ||
GV06avpari_u:69.2.3a: dvimūrdhā vā trinetro vā tathaikākṣir dvināsikaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:69.2.3c: hīnahasto 'paro hy arthe na tv atharvaśirāḥ sa ca ||
GV06avpari_u:69.2.5c: homaṃ kuryād atharvā tu tena nandati satkulam ||
GV06avpari_u:69.3.1a: na labhed yady atharvāṇaṃ kuryād daśaguṇaṃ svayam |
GV06avpari_u:69.3.1c: mahāvyāhṛtihomaṃ ca sāvitraṃ japam eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:69.3.2a: vikṛtāṅgo 'dhikāṅgo vā jāto hīnāṅgo eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:69.3.2c: kulasyādbhutam atyarthaṃ tad atharvā śamaṃ nayet ||
GV06avpari_u:69.3.3c: yasmin rāṣṭre nṛpas tatra ṣaṇmāsādd hi vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:69.3.4c: vṛkṣe 'nyavṛkṣajaṃ puṣpaṃ jāyate phalam eva vā ||
GV06avpari_u:69.3.5c: kārayeta mahāśāntiṃ rāṣṭrasya ca purasya ca ||
GV06avpari_u:69.4.2c: akasmān nirjalā vā syād aśoṣā vā mahāsarit ||
GV06avpari_u:69.4.3c: kuryuḥ śāntim atharvāṇo dvijā hy eteṣu bheṣajam ||
GV06avpari_u:69.4.4c: paṭhan na labhate vidyāṃ dvijaḥ śṛṇvann api śrutam ||
GV06avpari_u:69.4.5a: ādhitsur api nādhānaṃ kuryād āvāsam eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:69.4.5c: kanyā pariṇinīṣur vā kāmyeṣv iṣṭapatiṃ na ca ||
GV06avpari_u:69.5.1a: vandhyā vā mṛtavatsā yā durbhagā strīprasū ca yā |
GV06avpari_u:69.5.1c: sakṛtprasūtā yā nārī garbhaṃ gṛhṇāti naiva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:69.5.2c: na sūtiṃ labhate yā tu bahuputrīyate ca yā ||
GV06avpari_u:69.5.4a: athāpahantuṃ bhayam evamādikaṃ yadābhilaṣyet phalam uktam eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:69.5.4c: tadāṅgirasyaṃ varamantrasaṃpadā sphurantam uccaiḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajed dvijam ||
GV06avpari_u:69.5.5a: rātrau dvichāyavṛkṣaṃ vā kusvapnaṃ vāpi riṣṭadam |
GV06avpari_u:69.6.1a: jvālādbhutāny atha proktāni yāni ulkādibhedā gaditās tathā ye |
GV06avpari_u:69.6.1c: svapnādbhutāny api vānyādbhutāni gṛheṣu yāny arthavido vadanti
GV06avpari_u:69.6.2a: eteṣu śāntiṃ kurvīta amṛtāṃ vā sadakṣiṇām |
GV06avpari_u:69.6.2c: raudrīṃ vā vaiśvadevīṃ vā abhayāṃ vāparājitām ||
GV06avpari_u:69.7.1a: yasya rājño janapade sa nāsti vividhair bhayaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:69.7.1c: pīḍyate tasya tad rāṣṭraṃ paṅle gaur iva majjati ||
GV06avpari_u:69.7.3a: nityaṃ ca kārayec chāntiṃ grahaṛkṣāṇi pūjayet |
GV06avpari_u:69.7.4a: catuṣpatheṣu goṣṭheṣu tīrtheṣv apsu ca kārayet |
GV06avpari_u:69.7.5a: evaṃ tu khyāpayan rājā sarvakālaṃ jitendriyaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:69.7.5c: anantaṃ sukham āpnoti kṛtsnāṃ bhuṅkte vasuṃdharām ||
GV06avpari_u:69.8.1a: upasthitaṃ mṛtyum api dvijottamaḥ śamaṃ nayet |
GV06avpari_u:69.8.2a: dyutiṃ prabhāṃ sadā sphuran mantrapavitravān naraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:69.8.2c: nṛpe dhanini cānyatra śāntyāptvā dakṣiṇāṃ budhaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:69.8.3c: triḥ saṃhitāṃ haviṣyādyaṃ japet kṛcchraṃ ca śuddhaye ||
GV06avpari_u:69.8.5c: amatsarī nitāntaṃ yaḥ so 'tra śāntiṃ samārabhet ||
GV06avpari_u:69.8.6c: na nyūnaṃ tatra kiṃcit syād iti tad bhṛgubhāṣitam ||
GV06avpari_u:69.8.7c: kuryāt sarvam idaṃ jānann atharvahṛdayaṃ budhaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:69.9.1a: ye na jānanty adhītā api śrutim āṅgirasīṃ dvijāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:69.9.1c: atharvahṛdayaṃ cāpi na te vedavidaḥ smṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:69.9.4a: atharvā nādbhutaṃ tasya śāntir eva sadā bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70.1.1a: oṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat prājñaṃ vidvāṃso munayaḥ purā |
GV06avpari_u:70.1.2c: bhinnānāṃ śamanaṃ noktaṃ vada tv asaṃśayaṃ mune ||
GV06avpari_u:70.1.6a: teṣām ekaḥ pradhānatve yaḥ śānto dvijasattamaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.1.7a: brahmāṇaṃ taṃ nṛpaḥ kuryād dhotāraṃ sarvavedinam |
GV06avpari_u:70.1.7c: evam ukte bhṛguṃ viprāḥ procur vigatakalmaṣam ||
GV06avpari_u:70.1.9a: tatra śāntau prayuktāyāṃ kasya śāntiphalaṃ bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70.1.9c: nṛpo 'py adhārmikaḥ kuryād brahmaṇas tarpaṇaṃ purā ||
GV06avpari_u:70.1.10a: tataḥ kṛtā mahāśāntī rājānaṃ pāti sarvataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.1.10c: sa vṛtaḥ pāvanaṃ gacched dvijānāṃ pāvanāya vai ||
GV06avpari_u:70.2.1c: anaśnaṃś ca tryahaṃ dhīraḥ sa puraścaraṇo bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70.2.2c: anuktavac ca tryahaṃ tat karmaṇaḥ karaṇe kṣamam ||
GV06avpari_u:70.2.3a: kṛcchraṃ cāpi hitaṃ kṛtvā kuryuḥ karma samāhitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.2.4a: tataḥ paraṃ purodhaḥsu divyaṃ tatram avāpnuyāt |
GV06avpari_u:70.2.4c: grahātithyaṃ ca saṃrabhya diśāṃ yāgaṃ ca sarvataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70.2.5a: nakṣatreṣu ca sarveṣu yāgaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.3.1a: sāvitryā lakṣahomaṃ tu bhaume tiṣṭhed viśāradāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.3.1c: kuryur deyaṃ ca dānānāṃ viprebhyo yasya yat priyam ||
GV06avpari_u:70.3.2c: rathānāṃ vāraṇānāṃ ca dānaṃ kāmam ataḥ param ||
GV06avpari_u:70.3.3a: tuṣyeyur yena vā viprāḥ saṃbhavo yasya yasya hi |
GV06avpari_u:70.3.3c: tat tat sarvam upādeyam eṣa dānavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70.3.4a: dadyāc ca gurave grāmaṃ dhenuṃ vāsoyugaṃ tathā |
GV06avpari_u:70.3.5a: anena vidhinā bhaumam adbhutaṃ śamayed guruḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.3.5c: eṣa eva vidhir jñeyo viyatye 'py adbhutāśraye ||
GV06avpari_u:70.4.1a: viśeṣo 'yaṃ tu sāvitryā daśalakṣāṃs tu homayet |
GV06avpari_u:70.4.8c: sarvadā sarvakāmāṃs tu homaiḥ prāpnoti mānavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70.4.10a: sarveṣāṃ haviṣāṃ caiva ghṛtaṃ śāntikaraṃ smṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:70.4.10c: sarvadravye ghṛtaṃ tasmād dhome prakṣepam arhati ||
GV06avpari_u:70.5.1c: upavītaṃ tu pitryeṣu sarveṣv eva samārabhet ||
GV06avpari_u:70.6.3a: ghṛte vā madhudadhni vā yadā padmākṛtir bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70.6.3c: svastiko vāpi dṛśyeta tadā maraṇam ādiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:70.6.4c: śrotriyāya tu tad dadyād bhāvaiva śamayen naraḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70.6.5c: kuryād vā vāruṇīṃ śāntiṃ parameṇa samādhinā ||
GV06avpari_u:70.7.1a: anyākṛtiṣu vāpy etad ye sthāne śāntikārakāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.7.2a: calite jvalite pāte sphurita utpatite tathā |
GV06avpari_u:70.7.3a: tatra yudhyanti jātīnāṃ bhayaṃ tat syād asaṃśayam |
GV06avpari_u:70.7.4a: utpātaśamanārthaṃ tu ye kriyā na prayuñjate |
GV06avpari_u:70.7.6c: evaṃ kṛte bhayaṃ sarvaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva naśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:70.8.4c: tata eṣa viśuddhātmā puruṣaḥ sukham edhate ||
GV06avpari_u:70.8.5a: atha cet sa bahuvidhair adbhutaiḥ parisaṃyutaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.8.5c: saṃvatsaraṃ bhavec chīghraṃ kuryus tacchamanaṃ budhāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70.9.2a: pūrvaṃ tāvad viśuddhātmā sa puraścaraṇo bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70.9.3a: yāgaṃ kṛtvā grahāṇāṃ tu nakṣatrāṇāṃ tataḥ param |
GV06avpari_u:70.9.4a: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva yamendravaruṇāṃs tathā |
GV06avpari_u:70.9.4c: viśveśvaraṃ ca viṣṇuṃ ca yajetādbhutakarma ca ||
GV06avpari_u:70.9.6: kuryād devādṛto dhīmān evaṃ doṣaḥ praśāmyati ||
GV06avpari_u:70.10.1a: śvetaṃ vā bhavati payo vilohitaṃ vā pītaṃ vā bhavati hi kṛṣṇapiṅgalaṃ vā
GV06avpari_u:70.10.1c: utpātaḥ phalati yathā catuḥprakāras tat sarvaṃ śṛṇuta samāsato mayoktam ||
GV06avpari_u:70.10.2a: viprāṇāṃ bhavati hi śuklam ambudoṣe rājānaṃ sapadi nihanti lohitaṃ ca |
GV06avpari_u:70.10.2c: pītaṃ ced bhavati nihanti vaiśyavargaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ bhavati hi kṛṣṇapiṅgadoṣe ||
GV06avpari_u:70.10.3a: bījaṃ yatra praroheta phalam atha pramādataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.10.3c: etad atyadbhutaṃ nāma dampatyos tu vināśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:70.10.4c: antaḥkaraṇadoṣāc ca hetoḥ śāntir na jāyate ||
GV06avpari_u:70.11.1a: vicāritaṃ ca vidvadbhir niścitaṃ sudhiyā punaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70.11.2a: codite karmaṇy anyasmin nānyat kuryād vidhānavit |
GV06avpari_u:70.11.2c: na ca prārabhya karmāṇi sthātavyaṃ kva cid antare ||
GV06avpari_u:70.11.3a: nāpi kurvīta matimān kadā cit karmasaṃkaram |
GV06avpari_u:70.11.3c: kurvaṃs tu na tathā karma doṣam utpādayed bhṛśam ||
GV06avpari_u:70.11.4a: anyathākaraṇe doṣān samīkṣya tu bahūn iha |
GV06avpari_u:70.11.5a: dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ tu kārtsnyena tataḥ śāntiṃ samārabhet |
GV06avpari_u:70.11.5c: asamīkṣya tu kurvāṇo na śāntiṃ labhate naraḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70.12.1a: vātikasya yathā vaidyaḥ paittikasya ca niścaye |
GV06avpari_u:70.12.2a: tasmāt tāvat parīkṣeta yāvan niṣpannam adbhutam |
GV06avpari_u:70.12.3a: viguṇaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ tu karma kuryād upadravam |
GV06avpari_u:70.12.4a: hetuśrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ ca tasmāt sāguṇyam ācaret |
GV06avpari_u:70.12.4c: saguṇe ca kṛte tasmin sarvasaṃpad bhaved dhruvam ||
GV06avpari_u:70.12.6c: tat tat prāpnoty ayatnena satyam etad dvijottamāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.1.2c: śamanaṃ ca tathā teṣāṃ prabrūhi vinayena me ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.1.3a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.1.5a: yasmāc ca vāyur valavāñ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvādbhutodbhavaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.1.5c: tasmāt tam eva prathamaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvidhi ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.2.1a: yānti yānāny ayuktāni vinā nṛbhis tathā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.2.1c: yuktāni vā na gacchanti narendrāṇāṃ mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.2.2a: bheryo mṛdaṅgāḥ paṭahā vādyante vāpy anāhatāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.2.2c: āhatāś ca na vādyante acalāni calanti vā ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.2.3c: śarīraṃ vyathate tatra yadi vā veśmani śrutaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.2.4c: śarīraṃ bādhyate tatra vyādhir vā sumahān bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.2.5a: koṣṭhe vā patate yatra hastād darvī kadā cana |
GV06avpari_u:70b.2.5c: patate musalaṃ cāpi śūrpaṃ vā dhūyate yadi ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.3.1c: nārīṃ vā dhayate nārī jāyate tumulaṃ bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.3.4a: saptāham atha vā pakṣaṃ nibadhnāty atidāruṇam |
GV06avpari_u:70b.3.4c: tryahād yadi na varṣeta ghoraṃ śastrabhayaṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.3.5a: vāyavyeṣv eva nṛpatir vāyuṃ saptabhir arcayet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.3.5c: dvāv imāv iti tisro hi japtavyāḥ prayatair dvijaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.4.1c: vāyavyām eva śāntau ca vāyoḥ savitur āvapet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.4.2a: ādāv ante ca madhye ca tathaivam anuyojayet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.4.3a: yamakaṃ jāyate puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vā yamakaṃ yadi |
GV06avpari_u:70b.4.4c: yavā vā vrīhayo vāpi svāmino maraṇāya te ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.6.1a: anṛtu phalapuṣpaṃ vā na yathartu phalanti vā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.6.2c: tilā vā samatailāḥ syuḥ surātailā bhavanti vā ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.6.3a: agrāmyaṃ kārayet puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vā vikṛtaṃ nṛpaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.6.3c: dhānyānāṃ vaikṛte kṣetraṃ saha sasyena dāpayet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.6.4a: sauryaṃ caruṃ puṣpaphale vikṛte paśum eva ca |
GV06avpari_u:70b.6.4c: kṣaitrapatyaṃ ca bhaumaṃ ca nirvapet sasyavaikṛte ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.6.5a: sauryī śāntiḥ prayoktavyā sauryair mantrair yathāvidhi |
GV06avpari_u:70b.6.5c: uccā patantam ity ṛgbhyāṃ garbhaṃ tu parikīrtitam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.1c: sadakṣiṇair dvijair bhuktaiḥ kartāraṃ cārcayet tataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.2c: rudanto vā hasanto vā sravanto vā bahūn rasān ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.3a: arogā vā nivāte ca śākhā muñcanty asaṃbhrame |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.3c: phalaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā bālā darśayantīti hāsanam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.4c: [kṣipraṃ tatra bhayaṃ ghoraṃ ghoraṃ pravaryteta caturvidham ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.5a: sarpān matsyān pakṣiṇo vā yatra devaḥ pravarṣati |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.6a: surāsavaṃ tathā kṣaudraṃ sarpis tailaṃ tathā dadhi |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.6c: yatra varṣati parjanyaḥ kṣudragas tatra jāyate ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.7a: ulkātārāś ca dhiṣṇyeṣu yadāṅgārāṃś ca varṣati |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.7c: tadā vyādhibhayaṃ ghoraṃ teṣu deśeṣu nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.8a: nārācāḥ śaktayaḥ khaḍgāḥ pradīpyante yadā muhuḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.8c: tadā śastrabhayaṃ ghoraṃ teṣu deśeṣu nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.9a: pumān aśvo gajo vāpi yadā yatra pradīpyate |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.9c: naśyanti sevakās tatra pradhānaś ca vinaṅkṣyati ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.10a: yatra sravec caityavṛkṣaḥ sahasā vividhān rasān |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.10c: pṛthakpṛthak samastān vā tat pravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.11a: ghṛte madhuni dugdhe ca ghṛte dugdhe tathāmbhasi |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.11c: kṣaudre madhuni pānīye ghṛte caivāparaṃ payaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.12a: yatraitac ca mahotpātaṃ vṛkṣeṣu syāt sudāruṇam |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.13a: taile pradhānā vadhyante bhakte kṣudbhayam ādiśet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.13c: anṛtau cet phalaṃ yatra puṣpaṃ vā dṛśyate drume ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.14a: dhruvaṃ syād daśame māsi rājñas tatra viparyayaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.14c: puṣpe puṣpaṃ bhaved yatra phale caiva tathā phalam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.15a: parṇe parṇaṃ vijānīyāt tatra nānāvidhaṃ bhayam |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.16a: brāhmaṇānāṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ tadā tīvraṃ vinirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.18a: vivarṇair vāyavas tīvrāḥ paraṃ syur daśamāsataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.18c: daivatāni pralapanti yasya rāṣṭre hasanti vā ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.19a: udīkṣante puro vāpi tatra vidyān mahad bhayam |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.20a: māsāntareṇa jānīyāt tatra tatra mahad bhayam |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.20c: yatra citram udīkṣeta gāyate ceṣṭate muhuḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.21a: eteṣv aṣṭasu māseṣu rājño maraṇam ādiśet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.22a: vikāraṃ kuryur atyarthaṃ tatra vidyān mahābhayam |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.22c: utpāṭanaṃ tadāgānāṃ saraso vā fires tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.23a: samuddeśe pradīpyante vidyāt tatra bhayaṃ mahat |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.24a: kṣīraṃ snehaṃ surāṃ raktaṃ madhu toyaṃ sravanti vā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.24c: śūṣyanty arogāḥ sahasā śuṣkā ruhanti vā punaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.7.25: uttiṣṭhanti niṣīdanti tat pravakṣyāny ataḥ param ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.8.1a: hasane dehanāśaḥ syād yodhā naśyanti śakhayā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.8.4a: madhusrāve bhaved vyādhir jalasrāve na varṣati |
GV06avpari_u:70b.9.2c: chattradhvajaṃ ca dātavyaṃ parṇahomas tathā param ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.9.4a: gandhamālyaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca dīpaṃ dadyāt tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:70b.9.5a: pākaś ca daśame māsi śukrasya vacanaṃ yathā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.9.5c: bṛhaspatis tathāditye bruvete yat tathaiva tat ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.10.1c: durave dakṣiṇāṃ dadyān niṣkaṃ bhūmiṃ ca tatra vai ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.10.3c: atyaṅgāni anaṅgāni hīnāṅgāny atha vā punaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.10.4c: vināśas tatsya deśasya kulasya ca vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.10.5c: vidhvastaṃ vikṛtaṃ cāpi prajāyeta bhayāya tat ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.11.2a: vaḍavā hastinī gaur vā yadi yugmaṃ prasūyate |
GV06avpari_u:70b.11.2c: vijātaṃ vikṛtaṃ vāpi ṣaṇmāsair mriyate nṛpaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.11.3c: svāmino nagaraṃ yūtham anyathā tu vināśayet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.11.4a: viyoniṣu yadā yānti ṃśrībhāvaḥ prajāsv api |
GV06avpari_u:70b.11.4c: kharoṣṭrahayamātaṅgāḥ pakṣiṇo vā na sādhu tat ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.11.5a: akāle vāpi mādyante kāle vāpu amadā yadi |
GV06avpari_u:70b.11.5c: śivoṣṭrahayamātaṅgāḥ pakṣiṇo vā na sādhu tat ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.12.1a: athānaḍvān anaḍvāhaṃ dhenur dhenuṃ pibed yadi |
GV06avpari_u:70b.12.1c: śunī vā dhayate dhenuṃ śunīṃ dhenur athāpi vā ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.12.3a: viceṣṭāṃ vā virāvaṃ vā māsena mriyate nṛpaḥ] |
GV06avpari_u:70b.12.4c: jaṅgame sthāvaraṃ jātaṃ sthāvare vātha jaṅgamam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.12.5c: tyāgo vivāso dānaṃ vā dattvāpy āśu śubhaṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.13.2c: prājāpatyāṃ tataḥ śāntiṃ prājārthī kārayen nṛpaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.13.3a: ādāv ante ca madhye ca śāntāv uktas tu tadgaṇaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.13.3c: ārogyaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva deśe tasmin nṛpe bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.13.4c: susamṛddho 'pi deśaḥ sa kṣipram eva vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.13.5c: autpātikāni dṛśyante rājñas tatra mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.14.2a: devarājadhvajānāṃ ca patanaṃ bhaṅga eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.15.1c: saṃdhyā cobhayathā dīptā tatra vidyān mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.15.2a: yadi vā dīryate 'kasmād bhūmiś chidrībhaved yadi |
GV06avpari_u:70b.15.2c: prakampate 'timātraṃ vā sarveṣu ca bhayāya tat ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.15.3c: rakṣorūpāṇi dṛśyante na ca rakṣā gṛheṣv api ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.15.4a: saṃpraviṣṭaiḥ piśācair vā rakṣobhir vāpi tannibhaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.15.5a: ṛtavas tu viparyastā brāhmaṇāś ca vidharmiṇaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.16.1a: apūjyā yatra pūjyante na pūjyante ca pūjitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.16.1c: pūjyeṣv adānaniṣṭhā ca bhayam īdṛk pradarśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.16.2a: nādīyante na pūjyante brāhmaṇā balibhiḥ surāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.16.5c: prājāpatyaṃ mahendraṃ ca mahādevam athāpi vā ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.17.1a: aindrasthāne tu māhendrīṃ raudre raudrīṃ prayojayet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.17.2a: gurave tu śataṃ niṣkaṃ prajāsv evaṃ śivaṃ bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.17.4c: tīkṣṇaṃ ca varṣaty anṛtau ṛtuṣv eva na varṣati ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.17.5a: yadā coṣṇe bhavec chītaṃ śīte coṣṇaṃ tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:70b.17.5c: dṛṣṭo bhāvas tu vikṛto na yathartu svarūpakaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.17.6: anārogyaṃ bhavec caiva prajānām iti nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.18.1c: anṛtau tasya deśasya pradhānasya vadho dhruvam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.18.2a: śoṇitaṃ varṣate yatra tatra śastrabhayaṃ bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.18.3c: phalaṃ puṣpaṃ śamīdhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā bhayāya tat ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.18.5a: anabhre vā divā rātrau śvetam indrāyudhaṃ bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.19.1a: yady anabhre 'pi vimale sūryachāyā na dṛśyate |
GV06avpari_u:70b.19.1c: na nirabhre pratīpā vā tatra deśabhayaṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.19.2c: annāni sahiraṇyāni dhānyaṃ gāvaś ca dakṣiṇāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.19.4: śataṃ niṣkaṃ suvarṇasya dātavyaṃ vā gavāṃ śatam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.19.6c: na dīpyate sendhano vā sarāṣṭraṃ pīḍayen nṛpam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.19.7a: prajvaled dadhi māṃsaṃ vā tathā dūrvāpi kiṃ cana |
GV06avpari_u:70b.19.7c: agniṃ vinā yadāśuṣkaṃ niyataṃ nṛpater vadhaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.20.1a: prāsādaṃ toraṇaṃ dvāraṃ prākāraṃ kāśyapaṃ gṛham |
GV06avpari_u:70b.20.2a: anagninā yadi dahed vidyutā vāpi nirdahet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.20.3a: aniśāyāṃ tamāṃsi syur yadi vā pāṃsavo rajaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.20.3c: dhūmāś cānagnijā yatra tatra vidyān mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.20.4a: rātrau divā cānabhre vā yadi jvālā pradṛśyate |
GV06avpari_u:70b.20.4c: garhitaṃ jyotiṣāṃ caiva darśanaṃ vā bhaven niśi ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.20.5a: purāṇāṃ caiva patanaṃ jvalatāṃ ca muhurmuhur |
GV06avpari_u:70b.20.5c: dṛśyate 'nyac ca sahasā tatrāpy agnibhayaṃ vadet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.21.2a: jvalanti yadi śastrāṇi vinamanty unnamanti vā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.21.2c: kośebhyo vāpi niryānti saṃgrāmas tumulo bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.21.3c: vṛkṣā vā parvatā vāpi tatra vidyān mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.21.5c: dhanunā saha vā bāṇāḥ saṃgrāmas tumulo bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.22.1a: samidbhiḥ kṣīraṛkṣāṇāṃ sarṣapais tu ghṛtena ca |
GV06avpari_u:70b.22.1c: hotavyo 'gniḥ svakair mantraiḥ mantraiḥ suvarṇaṃ cātra dakṣiṇā ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.22.2a: pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ dvijātīn bhojayet tataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70b.22.2c: tebhya eva yathāśaktyā dakṣiṇāṃ dāpayen nṛpaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.22.3a: agnir bhūmyām iti tribhir āgneyaṃ tatra kārayet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.22.3c: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadyān niṣkam aśvaṃ ca sundaram ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.2a: devatā bhramate yatra mṛtyus tatra vinirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.2c: garjanaṃ vāpi kūpānām upasargas tu jāyate ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.3a: pratisrotavahā nadyo bhavanti ca kathaṃ cana |
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.5a: acalaṃ ca calaṃ yatra calaṃ vā<py> acalaṃ bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.5c: rājā vinaśyate tara deśo vāpi vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.6a: divā tārā yatra paśyec chvetaḥ pakṣy atha vā bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.7a: śaśakaṃ jambukaṃ vāpi sūkaraṃ hariṇaṃ tathā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.7c: sthānamadhye yadā paśyec chūnyaṃ bhavati niścayam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.8c: tat sthānaṃ tu bhavec chūnyaṃ bhagnaprākāratoraṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.9c: madhūni yatra dṛśyante tatra vai kasya kiṃ phalam ||........................
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.10c: sa deśo mānuṣair mukto mṛgāṇāṃ gocaro bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.11a: pratyādityaṃ yadā paśyet pure devakule 'pi vā |
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.13c: anagninā yadi dahet parighaṃ tatra vai dhruvam ||
GV06avpari_u:70b.23.14: tat pātaparityakta kadā cid api budhasyādayaṃ bhavati | dahanaṃ pavanajalamaraṇarogarakṣakṣayāya buddhivāk karoti budhaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.22.1a: om āsīnaṃ tu himavati bṛhaspatiṃ sukhāvaham |
GV06avpari_u:70c.23.1a: bṛhaspatiḥ pratyāha taṃ gautam || śvetaḥ sugandhiḥ padmābho nirbhūmo dundubhisvanaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.23.3a: svastikā vardhamānā ca śrīvatsā ca pradakṣiṇā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.23.3c: jvālārūpeṇa dṛśyeta sā vai śrīḥ sarvatomukhī ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.23.4a: yadā hotra prasannena hūyamāno yathā śikhī |
GV06avpari_u:70c.23.4c: ghoṣam utpādayan snigdhaṃ kalyāṇaṃ tad vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.23.5a: dīptaś ca ratnasaṃkāśaḥ kṣemo dundubhivad ghanaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.24.2a: yadā tv agniḥ sarvadikthā jvālāgraiḥ spṛśate haviḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.24.2c: tadāsya nṛpatiḥ śīghraṃ pararāṣṭraṃ ca mardati ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.24.3a: tiṣṭhantaṃ sthāvaraṃ snigdhaṃ śrūyate yatra gītakam |
GV06avpari_u:70c.24.3c: vācaḥ prasannā homeṣu maṅgalyāś caiva siddhaye ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.24.4c: homeṣu śravaṇaṃ caiva prādakṣiṇyaṃ ca śasyate ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.24.5a: śatapattrā rudantī ca cāṣasya nandanaṃ tathā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.25.1c: gāvaḥ savarṇavatsā ca dṛṣṭā home praśasyate ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.25.3a: gambhīraṃ nardate yatra tad agryaṃ siddhilakṣaṇam |
GV06avpari_u:70c.25.4a: dṛṣṭvā vā yadi vā śrutvā karmasiddhiṃ samādiśet |
GV06avpari_u:70c.25.5e: yasya syād vijayaṃ kuryāt kṣipraṃ narapater dhruvam ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.26.1c: kṛṣṇavartmā sugandhiḥ syāj jayaṃ kṣitipater vadet ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.26.2c: śiromālā ca dṛśyeta tad vai vijayalakṣaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.26.4c: grāmyā vā tyaktvā nagaram araṇyaṃ yānti nirbhayāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.26.5a: divā rātricarā vāpi rātrau vāpi divācarāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.26.5c: divā vā puramadhyasthā ghoraṃ vāśyanti nirbhayāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.1a: rājadvāre puradvāre śivā vāpy aśubhaṃ vadet |
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.2a: āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe vāpi śūnyaṃ bhavati tatpuram |
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.3a: dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭān nagare śūnyaṃ bhavati tatpuram] |
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.4a: śyenā gṛdhrā bakāḥ kākāḥ sarve maṇḍalacāriṇaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.4c: vāśante bhairavaṃ yatra tad apy āśu vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.5a: niśāyāṃ bahavaḥ śvāno roruvanti yadā tu te |
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.5c: hanyamānā na gacchanti tatra vāso na rocate ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.8a: grāmadvāre ca vāśyeta vanād āgatya jambukaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.8c: tīkṣṇasvareṇa mahatā diṣṭo grāmavadho hi saḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.9a: yad yāti veśma kapotaḥ praviśeta viśeṣataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.9c: rājaveśmany ulūko vā tat tyājyam acirād gṛham ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.27.10c: patanti bahavo gṛdhrāḥ kākolūkā bakaiḥ saha ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.28.1a: athāpy eteṣu sthāneṣu madhu saṃjāyate yadā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.28.1c: nalinī caiva valmīkaḥ ṣaṇmāsair mriyate nṛpaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.28.2a: mṛgaḥ paśur vā pakṣī vā sūkaro vāpi vāśyate |
GV06avpari_u:70c.28.2c: yadi cotthāya śṛṇute sa manuṣyo vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.28.3c: atīva bahuśo dṛṣṭvā durbhikṣeṇa kṣayaṃ vadet ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.28.5a: kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vā śṛṅgaṃ gṛhītvā śunakaḥ svayam |
GV06avpari_u:70c.28.5c: grāmamadhyena dhāvan syāt tathaivāhur mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.29.1a: purohitas tu kurvīta kāpotīṃ śāntim uttamām |
GV06avpari_u:70c.29.1c: devāḥ kapota iti ca sūktaṃ tatra samādiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.29.2a: āvāpe vyatiṣaṅge ca upariṣṭāc ca hūyate |
GV06avpari_u:70c.29.2c: kāmikāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād gurur vā yena tuṣyati ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.29.3c: udvijanti rudante vā prasvidyante hasanti vā ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.29.5a: avāṅmukhā vadante vā sthānāt sthānaṃ vrajanti vā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.29.5c: vapante vāgnim udakaṃ snehaṃ raktaṃ payo vasām ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.30.1a: jalpanti vā niśvasanti viceṣṭante rudanti vā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.30.1c: citraṃ saṃvīkṣyate yatra gātrair vāpi viceṣṭitaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.30.3a: rājño vā vyasanaṃ tatra sa vā deṣaḥ pralīyate |
GV06avpari_u:70c.30.4c: japahomaś ca kalpantā sīdatāṃ ca same pathi ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.30.5a: same pātam akasmāc ca udāsīnāṃ tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:70c.30.5c: dṛśyate tad vināśāya rājño janapadasya vā ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.31.1c: tatra śāmyanti ghorāṇi japahomaś ca kalpate ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.31.2a: prasādaḥ puṇḍarīkaṃ vā viśīryeta pateta vā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.31.3a: pitāmahasya dharmeṣu yan nimittaṃ dvijeṣu tat |
GV06avpari_u:70c.31.4c: jñeyaṃ māṇḍalikānāṃ ca yat tat skandaviśākhayoḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.31.5a: laukikaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jñeyaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca sarvadā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.1: athātaḥ sarvasarvasamucchayaḥ ekam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmo yathovāca bhagavān bṛhaspatiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.2c: tat samāsena bhūyo 'pi śṛṇu paryāyam āgatam ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.3a: parājito rāhunipīḍitamaṇḍalo vivarṇaḥ saṃdhyāvikṛto niḥprabho yadā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.3c: astamanaṃ yāti divākaraḥ tadāśu vidyāt subrahmajanakṣayam
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.4c: tadā dharmaphalaṃ kṣīṇaṃ kalim āviśate prajā ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.5a: amukto rāhuṇā sārdham uttiṣṭhati yadā śaśī |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.5c: tadā dharmaphalaṃ kṣīṇaṃ kalim āviśate prajā ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.6a: amukto rāhuṇā sārdham astaṃ gacchati candramāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.6c: tadā tato bhayaṃ vidyān mṛtyum āviśate prajā ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.8a: vātaprakopo rajasānuviddhā diśaś ca saṃdhyā ca ghanānuyātā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.8c: drakṣanti saṃdhyā yadi pañcavarṇā bhayāni rājñaḥ prativedayanti ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.9c: kṣipraṃ vidravate rāṣṭraṃ daśavarṣāṇi pañca ca ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.11a: yady ahni vāteṣu mahendrarekhā mahendracāpaḥ samudeti rātrau |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.11c: tadā bhayaṃ pārthivamaṇḍalānāṃ vadanti śāstrārthavido dvijendrāḥ
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.12a: nikalkayukto niśi sendracāpo vivardhamānaḥ samudeti rātrau |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.12c: viśīryamāṇā patate tatholkā tadā bhayaṃ pārthivamaṇḍalānām ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.13a: muñcanti nāgā rudhiraṃ karaiś ca lomāni dīpyanti turaṃgamāṇām |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.13c: dīpyanti khaḍgāni ca khecarāṇi cihnāni rājñaḥ prativedayanti ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.14a: girivarapatanaṃ svabhūmicālaḥ pratibhayatā ca tathaiva mānuṣāṇām |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.14c: vikṛtajananam uktim ugravācā mahati bhaye mṛgapakṣiṇo vadanti
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.15a: chattre gṛhe vāsarathe dhvaje ca dhūmaḥ samuttiṣṭhati yasya cāgniḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.15c: sa pārthivaḥ kṣīnamanuṣyakośaḥ prāpnoti nāśaṃ ca janakṣayaṃ ca ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.16a: mahormibhiḥ svair vitatair jaloghair nadyaḥ svakūlāc ca haranti vṛkṣān |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.16c: yadi pratisrotavahās tadā syur vināśanā deśaparā nṛpasya ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.17a: yadā tu ghāte ca divākaraprabhāḥ svareṇubhir vāpi vidhūmasaṃbhramāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.17c: na tasya vāsaṃ viṣaye vadanti āhur gaṇānāṃ ca vivṛddhināśaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.18a: hutāśanasy jvalanaṃ niredhaṃ tathā na caiva jvalate ca sedhmā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.19a: śiloccayānāṃ ca śilānipātaḥ puradrumāṇāṃ ca viṣāṇapātaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.19c: caityadrumāṇāṃ ca tathaiva pāto bhayāni rājñaḥ prativedayanti ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.20c: mṛṇālabāddhāś ca gajā bhavanti bhayāni rājñaḥ prativedayanti ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.21a: prāsādagopuramukhāś ca patanti yatra indradhvajotthitavanaspativājināṃ ca |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.21c: teṣāṃ vadanti pacanāni sukhāvahāni saumyādi saṃprabhayatā ca tathādiśanti ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.22a: ūrdhvaṃ vilokya nagaraṃ pratisaṃniviṣṭāḥ sūryodaye khalu rudanti śivātiraudram
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.22c: gṛdhrāś ca maṇḍalasamutpatitā bhramanti prāptaṃ bhayaṃ janapadasya samādiśanti ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.23a: daṇḍāśaniḥ patati yatra savisphuliṅgā bhūḥ kampate dinakarasya bhavet praśāntiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.23c: candhre ca yatra vikṛtaṃ ca bhaved aśāntaṃ māsāt samudbhavati tatra bhayo 'tighoraḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.24c: saṃdhyāsu rakṣo 'dhipater janānāṃ prabhūti rājño 'tibhaye bhavanti
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.25a: vṛṣṭir yadā varṣati reṇuvarṣais tatopariṣṭād dharitālavarṣam |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.25c: tataḥ paraṃ varṣati śailavarṣaṃ tadā balaṃ naśyati pārthivasya ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.26a: āraṇyo grāmavāsī mṛgaśakunigaṇo grāmavāsī vanānte gṛdhrāṇāṃ saṃnipāto narapatibhavane gopure vā pure vā |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.26c: yatra syān mānuṣīṇāṃ kharakarabhamukhānekarūpā prasūtis tatsthāne jīvitārthī sthitim ati kurute naiva pātaiḥ praduṣṭe ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.27a: prayānti devāḥ sahasāyatasthā vanāni vā yatra patanti bhūmau |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.27c: sthānāni mucyanti nadanti ke cit tathā paraṃ śoṇitajagdhagātrāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.29a: agnīnāṃ saṃpradoṣāḥ pratibhayajananā dīpyamānā diśaś ca madhyāhne cāntarikṣe grahagaṇakhacitā gṛdhrasaṃghaiḥ prakīrṇāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.29c: nirghātaiḥ pāṃsuvarṣaiḥ satatamalinatā bhūpracālaś ca ghoro devānāṃ cāśrupāto nṛpatibhayakarā rāṣṭranāśāya caite ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.30a: śivādaye yatra divākarasya jvālāvimucy ūrdhvamukhī praroditi |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.30c: samāvṛtā vāyasagṛdhrasaṃghais tadā bhayaṃ vedavido vadanti ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.31a: rudanti nāgās tu vimuktahastā vimuktadantās turagā rudanti |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.31c: rudanti nāryaś ca samāgame ca tadā bhayaṃ syāc chrutiliṅgamūlam
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.32a: yadā tu vastrāṇi varadrumāṇāṃ prakāśavṛṣṭyā nipatanti mūrdhni |
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.32c: samīkṣya pātaṃ ca yathārthadṛṣṭaṃ bhayāya rāṣṭrasya nṛpasya vidyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.34c: na tasyātikramaḥ kaś cid akṛte śāntikarmaṇi ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.35c: japaṃ homaṃ ca śāntiṃ ca utpāteṣu prayojayet ||
GV06avpari_u:70c.32.36c: homaṃ lakṣamitaṃ kuryāj japed vā vedasaṃhitām |
GV06avpari_u:71.1.1c: divyāṃś caivāntarikṣāṃś ca utpātān pārthivāṃs tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:71.2.1c: puṣpe phale ca vṛkṣāṇām akāle ca virohaṇe ||
GV06avpari_u:71.2.3a: ye cānye ke cid utpātā jāyante vikṛtātmakāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.2.3c: teṣāṃ phalaṃ ca kālaṃ ca tattvenācakṣva bhārgava ||
GV06avpari_u:71.2.4a: sa tasmai pṛcchate samyaṅ nāradāyāśanāḥ kaviḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.2.5a: yadā śīte bhavaty uṣṇam uṣṇe śītam atīva ca |
GV06avpari_u:71.2.5c: navamāsāt paraṃ vidyāt teṣu deśeṣu vai bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.3.1c: tasmin deśe pradhānasya puruṣasya vadho bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.3.2a: kokilāś ca mayūrāś ca akāle madabhāginaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.3.2c: saṃsargaṃ vāpi gaccheyur vidyāj jānapadaṃ bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.3.3a: ruravaś caiva raudrāś ca pṛṣatā hariṇās tathā |
GV06avpari_u:71.3.3c: yeṣu deśeṣu dṛśyante tān araṇyāya nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.3.4a: pradhānāś caiva vadhyante pakṣe saptadaśe tathā |
GV06avpari_u:71.3.4c: tasmiñ janapade caiva mahad utpadyate bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.3.5c: nakulāḥ pakṣiṇo vyālāḥ sūkarā mahiṣā mṛgāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:71.4.1a: sattvāny etāni jalpanti yeṣu deśeṣu mānuṣam |
GV06avpari_u:71.4.1c: teṣu deśeṣu rājā tu ṣaṣṭhe māsi vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:71.4.2a: utpātā vikṛtātmāno dṛśyante yatra tatra vai |
GV06avpari_u:71.4.2c: deśe bhavati śīghraṃ hi ṣaṇmāsād bhayam uttamam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.4.3a: āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ yadā yatra prasarpati |
GV06avpari_u:71.4.3c: vipakṣāt tatra tatsvāmī bhayaṃ prāpnoti dāruṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.4.4c: etāni yatra sarpanti vikṛtāni vadanti ca ||
GV06avpari_u:71.4.5a: bahu vā jāyate tīvraṃ tasmin deśe bhayaṃ mahat |
GV06avpari_u:71.4.5c: trīn māsān parakāle tu śeṣe saumyātikaṃ phalam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.5.1a: deśe vā yadi vā grāme yonivyatikaro bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:71.5.1c: tatra saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ mahad utpadyate bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.5.2a: gaur aśvaṃ vaḍavā vāpi yasmin deśe prasūyate |
GV06avpari_u:71.5.3a: mānuṣī janayed yatra tṛṇādān vividhān paśūn |
GV06avpari_u:71.5.3c: ṣaṇmāsotthaṃ bhayaṃ tīvraṃ tatra tūtpadyate mahat ||
GV06avpari_u:71.5.5a: sarpaṃ vā pakṣiṇaṃ vāpi janayed yatra mānuṣī |
GV06avpari_u:71.5.5c: pracalas tasya deśasya ṣaṇmāsāt tu paraṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.6.1a: uṣṭraṃ vā yā prasūyeta vānaraṃ vāpi mānuṣī |
GV06avpari_u:71.6.1c: anyad vā jaṅgamaṃ kiṃ cit sthāvaraṃ vāpi kiṃ cana ||
GV06avpari_u:71.6.2c: sa deśo vyathate śīghraṃ rājā tatra vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:71.6.3a: amānuṣī mānuṣaṃ vā mānuṣī vāpy amānuṣam |
GV06avpari_u:71.6.4a: caturakṣaṃ dviśīrṣaṃ vā gātrair nyūnādhikais tathā |
GV06avpari_u:71.6.5c: uṣṭro vṛṣo vāpy aśvo vā gajo vā yatra jāyate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.6.6a: pakṣān māsāc ca bhavati rājñas tatra bhayaṃ mahat |
GV06avpari_u:71.6.6c: paracakrasamutthaṃ vā sa deśo bhayam ṛcchati ||
GV06avpari_u:71.7.1c: gaur vā sūyet tathānyāni tatra rājyaṃ vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:71.7.2a: vasanti yeṣu deśeṣu teṣu vidyān mahad bhayam |
GV06avpari_u:71.7.2c: tasmād etāni sattvāni rājā kṣipraṃ pravāsayet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.7.3a: aśvā kiśoraṃ janayec chṛṅgiṇaṃ yatra tatra tu |
GV06avpari_u:71.7.3c: ādiśen maraṇaṃ rājño varṣābhyantara eva hi ||
GV06avpari_u:71.7.4a: māghe budhe ca mahiṣī śrāvaṇe vaḍavā divā |
GV06avpari_u:71.7.5c: rākṣasān vā piśācān vā yadāpy evaṃ prasūyate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.7.6a: vyāpadyante 'tra dhānyāni sasyāni ca dhanāni ca |
GV06avpari_u:71.7.6c: caturvidhaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ kṣipraṃ tatra pravartate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.8.1a: vadhyante hi pradhānās tu sārdhamāsāṣṭame tathā |
GV06avpari_u:71.8.1c: vyādhīṃś ca teṣu deśeṣu trīṇi varṣāṇi nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.8.2a: anagnir jvalate yatra deśe tūrṇam anindhanaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.8.2c: yo rājā tasya deśasya sadeśaḥ sa vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:71.8.3c: asthīni rudhiraṃ majjāṃ vasāṃ caiteṣu vai dhruvam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.8.4a: paracakrāgamaḥ śīghraṃ vijñeyas tu mahad bhayam |
GV06avpari_u:71.8.5c: kṣipraṃ tatra bhayaṃ ghoraṃ pravarteta caturvidham ||
GV06avpari_u:71.9.1a: sarpān matsyān pakṣiṇo vā yatra devaḥ pravarṣati |
GV06avpari_u:71.9.2a: surāsavaṃ tathā kṣaudraṃ sarpis tailaṃ payo dadhi |
GV06avpari_u:71.9.2c: yatra varṣati parjanyaḥ kṣudrogas tatra jāyate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.9.3a: ulkātārāś ca dhiṣṇyeṣu yadāṅgārāṃś ca varṣati |
GV06avpari_u:71.9.3c: tadā vyādhibhayaṃ ghoraṃ teṣu deśeṣu nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.9.4a: pumān aśvo gajo vāpi yadā yatra pradīpyate |
GV06avpari_u:71.9.5a: nārācāḥ śaktayaḥ khaḍgāḥ pradīpyante yadā muhuḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.9.5c: tadā śastrabhayaṃ ghoraṃ teṣu deśeṣu nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.10.1c: prahasanti prasarpanti gāyanti ca rudanti ca ||
GV06avpari_u:71.10.2c: sacakrā vāpi naśyanti pradhānaś cātra vadhyate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.10.3a: yatra sravec caityavṛkṣaḥ sahasā vividhān rasān |
GV06avpari_u:71.10.3c: pṛthakpṛthak samastān vā tat pravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.10.4a: ghṛte madhuni dugdhe ca ghṛte dugdhe tathāmbhasi |
GV06avpari_u:71.10.4c: kṣaudre madhuni taile vā vyādhayaḥ syuḥ sudāruṇāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:71.10.5c: taile pradhānā vadhyante bhakṣe kṣudbhayam ādiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.11.1a: anṛtau cet phalaṃ yatra puṣpaṃ vā sūyate drumaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.11.1c: vidyād dvādaśame māsi rājñas tatra viparyayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.11.2a: puṣpe puṣpaṃ bhaved yatra phale vā syāt tathā phalam |
GV06avpari_u:71.11.2c: parṇe parṇaṃ vijānīyāt tatra jānapadaṃ bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.11.3c: brāhmaṇānāṃ bhayaṃ ghoram āśu tīvraṃ vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.11.5a: nīlaiḥ sasyopaghātaḥ syāc citrais tu mṛgapakṣiṇām |
GV06avpari_u:71.11.5c: vivarṇair vyādhayas tīvrāḥ paraṃ syur daśamāsataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:71.12.1a: daivatāni prasarpanti yatra rāṣṭre hasanti vā |
GV06avpari_u:71.12.1c: udīkṣante 'tha rodhāṃsi tatra vidyān mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.12.3a: yatra citram udīkṣeta gāyate ceṣṭate muhuḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.12.3c: eteṣv aṣṭasu māseṣu rājño maraṇam ādiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.12.4c: vikāraṃ kuryur atyarthaṃ tatra vidyān mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.12.5a: udapānaṃ taḍāgaṃ vā saraḥ parvata eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:71.13.1a: [prahaseyuḥ staneyur vā] śvā vā mārjāravad vadet |
GV06avpari_u:71.13.1c: tasya deśasya rājā tu pīḍām āpnoti dāruṇām ||
GV06avpari_u:71.13.2c: deśe yatra bhṛśaṃ tatra rājadaṇḍo nipātyate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.13.3a: yasya rājño janapade nityodvignāḥ prajāḥ kṣayam |
GV06avpari_u:71.13.3c: gacchanti na citrāt tatra vināśam api nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.13.4a: yasya rājño janapade nityam eva gavāṃ kṣayaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.13.5a: yasya rājño janapade nadī vahati kardamam |
GV06avpari_u:71.13.5c: kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ copalaṃ vā mṛtamatsyān grahāṃs tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:71.14.1a: madyaṃ kṣaudraṃ ca māṃsaṃ ca sarpis tailaṃ payo dadhi |
GV06avpari_u:71.14.2a: yasya rājño janapade pratisroto nadī vahet |
GV06avpari_u:71.14.3a: kūpo vā garjate yatra yadā vāpy avadīryate |
GV06avpari_u:71.14.3c: lohitaṃ vātha pūyaṃ vā bhayaṃ tatra vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.14.4c: tūṇīrāt sahasā bāṇā udgiranti nadanti ca ||
GV06avpari_u:71.14.5a: svabhāvataś ca pūryante dhanūmṣi prajvalanti ca |
GV06avpari_u:71.14.5c: saṃgrāmo dāruṇas tatra deśe bhavati biścitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:71.15.1a: akāle puṣpavantaś ca phalavantaś ca pādapāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.15.1c: dṛśyante yasya rāṣṭreṣu tasya nāśo vibhāvyate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.15.2a: vṛkṣā vallyaś ca taruṇā yatra syuḥ phalapuṣpadāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.15.2c: akāle cāpi dṛśyeyus tatra vidyān mahad bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.15.3a: prāsādāni vimānāni prajvalanti tu yatra vai |
GV06avpari_u:71.15.3c: dṛḍhāni ca viśīryante yasya sa mriyate 'cirāt ||
GV06avpari_u:71.15.4a: vadanty araṇye tūryāṇi śrūyante vyomni nityaśaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.15.4c: nivaseta tadā rājā samāgamya diśo daśa ||
GV06avpari_u:71.15.5c: akasmān mriyate samyag dhanaṃ cāsya vilupyate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.15.7a: saṃbhṛtyaiva tato bhāram anyaṃ janapadaṃ vrajet |
GV06avpari_u:71.15.7c: mṛgavāṃs tu sa deśo hi vāyuś cātropajāyate ||
GV06avpari_u:71.15.8c: chidrāṇi ca gṛhe yasya sa śīghraṃ bhayam ṛcchati ||
GV06avpari_u:71.15.9a: devarājadhvajānāṃ ca patanaṃ bhaṅga eva vā |
GV06avpari_u:71.15.9c: kravyādānāṃ praveśaṃ ca rājñaḥ pīḍākaraṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.16.1a: aśvatthe puṣpite kṣatraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cāpy udumbare |
GV06avpari_u:71.16.1c: plakṣe vaiśyāś tu pīḍyante nyagrodhe dasyavas tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:71.16.4a: indrayaṣṭir bhajyate vā viśasto vā paśur vrajet |
GV06avpari_u:71.16.4c: yadā tadā vijānīyād rājñaḥ pīḍām upasthitām ||
GV06avpari_u:71.17.1a: bṛhaspatau vā śukre vā pāvake pākaśāsane |
GV06avpari_u:71.17.1c: yāni rūpāṇi dṛśyante vidyāt tāni purohite ||
GV06avpari_u:71.17.2c: nimittaṃ tat pārthiveṣu vijñeyaṃ saṃpravartitam || [akasmād dṛśyate yat tu nimittaṃ saṃprakīrtitam
GV06avpari_u:71.17.3a: devānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca ratho yatra nimajjati |
GV06avpari_u:71.17.4a: some ca vāsudeve ca varuṇe pākaśāsane |
GV06avpari_u:71.17.4c: yad bhayaṃ dṛśyate tadd hi jñeyaṃ bhāṇḍādhike kane ||
GV06avpari_u:71.17.5a: vāte prājāpatau caiva viśvakarmaṇi caiva hi |
GV06avpari_u:71.17.5c: pravartate yan nimittaṃ taj jānapadikaṃ bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.17.6c: tathā preṣyeṣu sarveṣu kalpayec chāstrataḥ phalam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.17.7c: vīramātā ca yad brūyus tad rājamahiṣībhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.17.8a: ekaivāsāṃ tathā cānyā yāś cānyā devatāḥ striyaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.17.8c: kuryur nimittaṃ tat strīṇāṃ pradhānānāṃ ca nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.17.9a: gandharveṣu nimittaṃ yat tad anyeṣu pradṛśyate |
GV06avpari_u:71.18.1c: sarveṣv aṅgeṣu nārīṇāṃ tulyaṃ syād ubhayor bhayam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.18.4c: te ca deśā vinaśyanti rājā vātha vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:71.18.5a: brāhmaṇā yatra vadhyante grāme rāṣṭre 'tha vā pure |
GV06avpari_u:71.18.5c: rājadhānīṣu vā yatra tad abhāvasya lakṣaṇam ||
GV06avpari_u:71.19.1c: tatra daivakṛto daṇḍo nipataty āśu rājani ||
GV06avpari_u:71.19.4a: senā caiva na dṛśyeta hastyaśvaiś ca padātibhiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:71.19.4c: hīnāṅgā vikṛtāṅgā vā pralayaṃ tatra nirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:71.19.5a: stambhavṛkṣā dhvajā yatra sraveyū rudhirāmbu ca |
GV06avpari_u:71.19.5c: dhūmayeyur jvaleyur vā mantriṇāṃ tatra vai vadhaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:71.19.6a: jagatsvāmini jānīyād yadi ced divi jāyate |
GV06avpari_u:71.19.6c: āntarikṣaṃ tu deśe syād bhaumaṃ sasyopatiṣṭhati ||
GV06avpari_u:71.19.7a: bhāryāyāṃ vāhane putre kośe senāpatau pure |
GV06avpari_u:71.19.7c: purohite narendre vā patate daivam aṣṭadhā ||
GV06avpari_u:71.19.8a: māhendrīm amṛtāṃ raudrīṃ vaiśvadevīm athāpi vā |
GV06avpari_u:71.19.9a: śāmyanti yena ghorāṇi yogakṣemaṃ ca jāyate |
GV06avpari_u:72.1.2: kṣipravipākīny amoghāni ghorāṇi grahopahatam ulkābhihataṃ grastaṃ nirastam upadhūpitaṃ vā yadā syāj janmanakṣatraṃ karmanakṣatram abhiṣecanīyajanapadanakṣatram
GV06avpari_u:72.1.3: eteṣu kṣipram eva mahāśāntim amṛtāṃ kārayed rājāṣṭame ca candramasaḥ sthāne <vajre> ca devopasṛṣṭe skambhe vā
GV06avpari_u:72.1.4a: atha vā nānāvarṇe bahurūpe śṛṅgiṇi cāditye kīlavati
GV06avpari_u:72.1.5: kacandha eva niśvasati hasati bhramati hāse bhāse nāde śabde vāsane ca vaiśvānare 'prajvalite
GV06avpari_u:72.1.6: 'ntarikṣe bhasmāsthyaśmāṅgārā vīthī cendradhanuṣi rātrau vīdhra eva tu ||
GV06avpari_u:72.2.1: candrārkau yasya rāṣṭre pariviṣyetātāṃ tān vipakṣān parolakasaṃsthāñ janapadāṃs
GV06avpari_u:72.2.2: tathaiva kākakapotakaṅkagṛdhrayakṣarākṣasapiśācaśvāpadeṣu naktaṃ vadatsv abhivadatsu gāyatsu rāyatsu vā cakradhvajaveśmāvasathaprāsādāgre
GV06avpari_u:72.2.3: vāpīkūpa udapāne codgirati nadati vidyotati vā
GV06avpari_u:72.2.6: kālolūkakṛkalāsaśyenanipatite rājachattre bhagne dhvaje cakrasya rājño daṇḍe rājñaś ca dante
GV06avpari_u:72.2.7: hastinyāṃ ca mattāyāṃ grāme ca prasūtāyām
GV06avpari_u:72.2.8a: rājarathaś ca rājādhirūḍho bhagnākṣaḥ saptarātrād rājño
GV06avpari_u:72.2.8c: hanti purohitam amātyaṃ senāpatiṃ jāyāṃ hastinaṃ mahiṣīṃ kumāraṃ rājānam eva vā ṛdhnuyād ya evaṃ veda
GV06avpari_u:72.2.9a: dvādaśaṃ śataṃ gavāṃ dhenūnāṃ kaṃsavasanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ niṣko
GV06avpari_u:72.3.1e: tasmāt sthānaṃ samuddiśya kārayec chāntim ātmanaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:72.3.5a: hīnagabhastī dve mārge vīthyau vittakṣaye somasya kṣaye
GV06avpari_u:72.3.6: grahavaiṣamyam ārohaṇam ākramaṇaṃ gandharvanagaraṃ mārutaprakopas tithikaraṇamuhūrtanakṣatragrahādīnāṃ
GV06avpari_u:72.3.7c: vāyasasamavāyā vṛkaśakaṭārohaṇaṃ vṛṣadaṃśātimārjanam ulūkapratigarjanaṃ śyenagṛdhrādīnāṃ dhvajābhilapanam
GV06avpari_u:72.3.8a: vikṛtāś ca mānuṣāmānuṣaprabhavāḥ strībālavṛddhapralāpāḥ pradīptendrayaṣṭipādabhagne 'dravyeṣv ekavṛkṣe dvichāye pratichāye
GV06avpari_u:72.3.9a: ata ūrdhvam [chāyo] 'kasmāc caityavṛkṣastambhapatane virohatsv aviroheṣv achinnaparṇaprapātāc chuṣkaśākhino drumā
GV06avpari_u:72.3.9c_1: ucitānāṃ vyucchedane 'nucitānāṃ pravardhane dṛḍhabhaṅgesu (AVParis_72,3.11) śuṣkavirohe gṛhe valmīke śayanadeśe darhastambotpattau
GV06avpari_u:72.3.12a: yatra rājāprasādamukhaḥ paureṣu ca bhṛtyādiṣu bhavati
GV06avpari_u:72.3.13a: yadā tu pratipat somo vikṛtyā vikṛto bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:72.3.13c: anudbhinno vilūno vā rājño maraṇam ādiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:72.3.15a: yadā candrārkayor madhye kṛṣṇaṃ bhavati maṇḍalam |
GV06avpari_u:72.3.15c: sa śaṅkur iti vijñeyo grahaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:72.3.16c: tatra kuryān mahāśāntim amṛtāṃ viśvabheṣajīm iti ||
GV06avpari_u:72.4.1a_0: atha yasminn eva janapade gobrāhmaṇasūtasāṃvatsaravaidyānāṃ parivrājakacāraṇavānaprasthabrahmacāriṇāṃ vāpi saṃkaraḥ pravartate
GV06avpari_u:72.4.1a_1: tad adbhutaṃ vidyāt (AVParis_72,4.2) karmasaṃkaraṃ yajñasaṃkaraṃ vyavahārasaṃkaraṃ ca yatra ca
GV06avpari_u:72.4.3: teṣām ajñātaprāyaścittaṃ yad ajñātam anāmnātam iti madhye juhuyāt puruṣasūktaṃ ca teṣv akṛtaprāyaścitteṣu mahādbhutāni prādurbhavanti ||
GV06avpari_u:72.4.4a: divyānīty ācakṣate devagṛheṣv atha hasanti gāyanti
GV06avpari_u:72.4.4c: rudanti krośanti prasvidyanti pradhūmāyanti prajvalanti prakampanty unmīlayanti nimīlayanti lihitaṃ sravanti parivartayanti vā
GV06avpari_u:72.4.5: teṣām prādurbhāvagamaneṣv anyarājāgamanaṃ vā vidyād udagraṃ vā[ṅgegam] avṛṣṭiśastrabhayaṃ bubhukṣāmāraṃ jānapadam amātyānāṃ rājño vināśam
GV06avpari_u:72.4.6: teṣu sarveṣu bhṛgvaṅgirovidam ity uktaṃ sa catuṣpatha īśānaṃ prapadyeta || oṃ prapadye bhūḥ prapadye bhuvaḥ prapadye svaḥ prapadye janat prapadya iti prapadyeta
GV06avpari_u:72.4.7a: kapilānām aṣṭaśatasya kṣīreṇa pāyasaṃ śrapayitvā kapilāsv
GV06avpari_u:72.4.7c: alabhyamānāsu dogdhrīṇāṃ śatasya kṣīreṇa pāyasaṃ śarapayitvā prāñcam idhmam upasamādhāya paristīrya barhī raudreṇa gaṇena śāntā juhuyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:72.5.1a_0: sarpir juhuyāt pāyasaṃ juhuyāc chuklāḥ sumanasa upahared brāhmaṇān bhaktenopepasanti tā eva gā dadyād rājyaṃ vā parimitakālaṃ
GV06avpari_u:72.5.1a_1: tasya parituṣṭaye gosahasraṃ kartre dadyād grāmavaraṃ ca atha yatraitac chayane vātha vastre vā jāyate yad dhutāśanaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:72.5.3a: sṛjanti devā divyādbhutāni prāg upasargāt pratibodhanārtham |
GV06avpari_u:72.5.3c: kāryāṇi vighnāni tathā janānāṃ karmākule varṇasamākule ca ||
GV06avpari_u:72.5.4a: daivyopasṛṣṭena balena kāryaṃ kārya ca śāntiḥ praṇipatya devān |
GV06avpari_u:72.5.4c: tatopasargād vighnāt pramucyate divi ced aniṣṭaṃ na punaḥ sa kuryāt ||
GV06avpari_u:72.5.5a: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca divi cāpy upalakṣayet |
GV06avpari_u:72.6.1a: grāme kule vā yadi vāpi deśe rājany amātyeṣu tathā dvijeṣu |
GV06avpari_u:72.6.1c: bhāvaḥ paśūnāṃ vikṛto virūpas tad adbhutaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāt
GV06avpari_u:72.6.2c: apādahaste mriyate hy amātyo jāte kavandhe nṛpatir vinaśyet ||
GV06avpari_u:72.6.3: yadādhikāṅgo yadi vāṅgahīno bhavet paśūnāṃ vikṛto virūpaḥ | strīṇāṃ tathaiva vikṛto virūpas tad adbhutaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:72.6.4a: anāsyaṃ vāpy anoṣṭhaṃ vā jāyate ced vidūlakam |
GV06avpari_u:72.6.4c: arūpam asarūpaṃ vā jāyate ced vidūlakam ||
GV06avpari_u:72.6.5a: adharādīnn acakṣur vā jāyate ced vidūlakam |
GV06avpari_u:72.6.6: tam adbhiḥ snātaṃ surabhiṃ sugandhiṃ gatāsum agnau juhuyād ghṛtāktam |
GV06avpari_u:8052: ganeṇa raudreṇa ghṛtaṃ ca hutvā tathā mahātmā śivam asya kuryāt ||
